translation.en: [man 1] We the People.
translation.zh: 我们合众国人民

translation.en: [man 2] We the People.
translation.zh: 我们合众国人民

translation.en: [man 3] We the People.
translation.zh: 我们合众国人民

translation.en: -[man 4] We the People. -[man 5] We the People.
translation.zh: -我们合众国人民 -我们合众国人民

translation.en: -[man 6] We the People! -[man 7] We the People!
translation.zh: -我们合众国人民！ -我们合众国人民！

translation.en: -[man 8] We the People! -[man 9] We the People!
translation.zh: -我们合众国人民！ -我们合众国人民！

translation.en: Wait… [breathes deeply]
translation.zh: 等等…

translation.en: We the People…
translation.zh: 我们合众国人民…

translation.en: -[all cheering] -Yeah!
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: -We the People! -We the People!
translation.zh: -我们合众国人民！ -我们合众国人民！

translation.en: Sorry, Tom, "We the People" it is.
translation.zh: 抱歉 汤姆 就用“我们合众国人民”了

translation.en: You can use "Us rich white guys" on your Christmas card.
translation.zh: 你可以在圣诞卡片上写 “我们富有的白人男子”

translation.en: Mmm, at Dartmouth, we play with actual paddles.
translation.zh: 在达特茅斯学院 我们会用真正的球拍来击球

translation.en: Nobody fucking cares how you do it at Dartmouth, Tom.
translation.zh: 谁他妈管你们 在达特茅斯怎么玩 汤姆

translation.en: Franklin, these bucktooth fun police can suck it
translation.zh: 富兰克林 这些扫兴的龅牙就见鬼去吧… （我们合众国人民）

translation.en: because we've done it, boys!
translation.zh: …因为我们成功了 伙计们！

translation.en: -We have declared our independence! -[all] Huzzah!
translation.zh: -我们宣布独立了！ -好！

translation.en: Lincoln and his idiot lackey, Washington, are gonna be pissed they missed this.
translation.zh: 林肯和他的笨蛋马屁精华盛顿 错过了这一切 一定气坏了

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Ooh! We should take a picture!
translation.zh: 我们应该拍张照！

translation.en: Say "cheese."
translation.zh: 说“茄子”

translation.en: Benedict Arnold?
translation.zh: 本尼迪克特阿诺德？

translation.en: -It's the Redcoats! Run! -[men yelling]
translation.zh: 是英国兵！快跑！

translation.en: What is happ--
translation.zh: 怎么回…

translation.en: -[head] No, no, no! -Declarate this!
translation.zh: -不！ -宣布这个试试！ （“茶”弹）

translation.en: Now I just have to catch a show with my old chum, Abraham Lincoln.
translation.zh: 现在我要和我的老友 亚伯拉罕林肯一起去看一场表演

translation.en: [Abe] Four score and seven years ago,
translation.zh: （福特剧场） 八十七年前

translation.en: I swore an oath to never tell a lie.
translation.zh: 我发誓绝不说谎

translation.en: To be true to my family, my friends, and the Republic for which they stand,
translation.zh: 真诚对待我的家人 朋友和他们支持的共和国

translation.en: which is why I am compelled, by divine duty, to tell you
translation.zh: 因此我负有神圣的使命 告诉你…

translation.en: your prices are fucking insane!
translation.zh: （约翰威克斯 小卖铺） …你们的价格真他妈离谱！

translation.en: Wow, easy. Take it up with the King.
translation.zh: 冷静 去找国王说去 （税）

translation.en: -Something about taxation! -[colonists] Yeah, that's right!
translation.zh: -是税的问题！ -对 没错！

translation.en: Dude, I just work here.
translation.zh: 老兄 我只是个打工的

translation.en: But… Uh… Something about representation!
translation.zh: 可是…这是代表权的问题！

translation.en: -Yeah! -You tell 'em, Abe!
translation.zh: -对！ -跟他们说说 亚伯！

translation.en: -[George] Abe! -This isn't over, pal!
translation.zh: -亚伯！ -这不算完 伙计！

translation.en: [sighs] You don't gotta be such a damn tyrant about it.
translation.zh: 没必要这么蛮横吧

translation.en: -This guy dared me to climb up here. -[man] No, I didn't.
translation.zh: -这个人赌我不敢爬上来 -不 我没有

translation.en: Well, you should've! Whoo!
translation.zh: 那你应该试一试！

translation.en: -[colonists cheering] -Yeah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: George, you are a wild man.
translation.zh: 乔治 你真狂野

translation.en: [sighs] What can I say?
translation.zh: 我能怎么说呢？

translation.en: Somebody's gotta balance out all your boring politics.
translation.zh: 总要有人中和一下你那无聊的政治

translation.en: [chuckles] George, I guess that's what makes us such a good team.
translation.zh: 乔治 所以说我们是绝佳队友

translation.en: A team that will last until we both die of natural causes and old age,
translation.zh: 我们永远都是好队友 直到咱俩寿终正寝为止

translation.en: in our forties.
translation.zh: 直到40几岁为止

translation.en: But I do wish ya cared about more than just partying.
translation.zh: 但我希望你除了派对以外 能关心点别的事

translation.en: [gasps] Abe! I care about more than that, all right?
translation.zh: 亚伯！我可不只关心派对 好吗？

translation.en: I also care about… how good we look!
translation.zh: 我还关心…我们的形象！ （最铁兄弟）

translation.en: Oh, George. You paid 35 bucks for a T-blouse?
translation.zh: 哦 乔治 你花35块买了一件T恤？

translation.en: No, I paid 70 bucks for two T-blouses.
translation.zh: 不 我花70块买了两件T恤

translation.en: Twinsies!
translation.zh: 双胞胎！

translation.en: George, I wish I had a million friends like you.
translation.zh: 乔治 真希望我有上百万个你这样的朋友

translation.en: -Should I put it on my body? -Yeah, put it on your body.
translation.zh: -我要穿上吗？ -好 穿上吧

translation.en: Oh, it feels so soft on my body.
translation.zh: 穿起来真软和

translation.en: -It's like a blend. Is it a blend? -It's a tri-blend.
translation.zh: -像混纺的 是混纺吗？ -三合一混纺

translation.en: Oh, it's so soft, I'd swear it's a quad blend.
translation.zh: 好软 要我说肯定是四合一混纺

translation.en: -I know. [sighs] -Oh, shit, oh!
translation.zh: -我知道 -不得了

translation.en: Oh, here comes Ben.
translation.zh: 本来了

translation.en: -Ooh! Uh, hey, Ben. -Benedict.
translation.zh: -嘿 本 -本尼迪克特

translation.en: Oh, sorry. Last two.
translation.zh: 抱歉 只剩最后两件了

translation.en: I'm so glad you came.
translation.zh: 你们能来真好

translation.en: Mmm, I was worried that you might have caught wind
translation.zh: 我还在担心你们可能听说了

translation.en: of my little surprise.
translation.zh: 我准备的小惊喜

translation.en: No, not at all, man. These are boffo seats! We didn't even see this coming at all.
translation.zh: 不 完全没有 这座位好极了！ 我们完全没想到

translation.en: What are you up to?
translation.zh: 你想干什么？

translation.en: You hate surprises and general whimsy.
translation.zh: 你不是讨厌惊喜和一切怪念头的吗？

translation.en: I've always told you, Abraham,
translation.zh: 亚伯拉罕 我总是跟你说

translation.en: that your revolution would be the end of you.
translation.zh: 你的革命会成为你的末日

translation.en: And I've always told you, Ben, that I was willing to take that chance.
translation.zh: 本 我也总跟你说 我愿意冒这个险

translation.en: That we should all be willing to take that chance.
translation.zh: 我们都该愿意冒这个险

translation.en: Yes, you have.
translation.zh: 是的 你们做到了

translation.en: The only problem is you assumed, all this time,
translation.zh: 唯一的问题是 你们一直以为

translation.en: that I'm part of your "we," when, in fact,
translation.zh: 我和你们是一边的 但实际上

translation.en: I'm with a different "we," now.
translation.zh: 我现在是另外一边的

translation.en: Uh, I didn't… I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我没…我不明白

translation.en: I changed teams, assholes.
translation.zh: 我换边了 混蛋

translation.en: Oh, Ben, good for you!
translation.zh: 本 太好了！

translation.en: I'm so glad that you're embracing your true self.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你能拥抱真正的自己

translation.en: No! I'm gonna be fuckin' rich.
translation.zh: 不！我要和富人一伙儿了

translation.en: Oh, Rich sounds like a great guy, would love to meet him.
translation.zh: 富人听起来是个好人 有空我们认识一下

translation.en: -We could do a double date? -You're misunderstanding.
translation.zh: -也许我们可以来一次双约会？ -你误会了

translation.en: -I'll be doing the Redcoat Shuffle. -Hey.
translation.zh: -我要去穿红制服了 -嘿

translation.en: Whatever you guys do in private is your business.
translation.zh: 你们私下玩什么制服游戏是你们的事

translation.en: That's one of the things we're fighting for!
translation.zh: 这就是我们为之斗争的目标之一

translation.en: Stop being so damn accepting for a minute!
translation.zh: 不要我说什么 你老是一副欢欣接纳的样子！

translation.en: I have aligned myself with the Brits.
translation.zh: 我加入英国人那边了

translation.en: [hesitating] George, are you hearing this?
translation.zh: 乔治 你听到了吗？

translation.en: Are you seeing this?
translation.zh: 你看到没？

translation.en: Abe, they're using things as instruments that you're not supposed to use.
translation.zh: 亚伯 他们用意想不到的东西做乐器

translation.en: -It's crazy! -George, fuck!
translation.zh: -太疯狂了！ -乔治 该死！

translation.en: [hesitates] You've sided with the fun police?
translation.zh: 你加入不懂乐趣的扫兴军团了？

translation.en: Something about taxation. Don't you remember?
translation.zh: 这事跟税有关 你不记得了吗？

translation.en: Hot take, Abe. Fun sucks.
translation.zh: 新鲜热评 亚伯 乐趣不是什么好东西

translation.en: The Declaration was signed tonight, Ben.
translation.zh: 《独立宣言》今晚已经签署了 本

translation.en: You're too late to stop the revolution. Ha-ha!
translation.zh: 现在阻止革命太迟了

translation.en: -Oh, am I? -[Abe gasps]
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -Your friends in revolution are all dead. -[Abe] What?
translation.zh: -你那些参加革命的朋友都死了 -什么？

translation.en: And as for your precious Declaration of Independence…
translation.zh: 至于你宝贵的《独立宣言》…

translation.en: -Oh, it's beautiful! -A-Kelly Ripa!
translation.zh: -写得真好！ -马拉“撕”基！

translation.en: [Abe] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: But you're Benedict "Cosby" Arnold!
translation.zh: 但你是本尼迪克特 “考斯比”阿诺德啊！

translation.en: -You're better than this! -You're right.
translation.zh: -你不该是这样的人！ -你说得对

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 我确实不是

translation.en: Abe, what the… Oh, my God. Your neck's… Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 亚伯 怎么…哦 我的天 你的脖子…哦 我的天！

translation.en: Your neck is bleeding! Is this part of the show?
translation.zh: 你的脖子在流血！ 这是表演的一部分吗？

translation.en: Look, I don't do well with interactive theater, okay?
translation.zh: 我不太擅长玩互动戏剧 好吗？

translation.en: It kinda freaks me out.
translation.zh: 我有点吓到了

translation.en: I know. That's great. We're number one, I get that.
translation.zh: 我知道 很好 我们是第一名 我知道

translation.en: But I don't see what that has to do with…
translation.zh: 但我不明白这和那个有什么关…

translation.en: Arnold, behind you. No, Abe, I'm George.
translation.zh: -阿诺德 在你身后 -不 亚伯 我是乔治

translation.en: It's George!
translation.zh: 是乔治！

translation.en: George, turn around.
translation.zh: 乔治 转身

translation.en: Ben! Ben, what the fuck, man?
translation.zh: 本！搞什么 伙计？

translation.en: Someday, Georgie, you'll have to draft a document
translation.zh: 有朝一日 小乔治 你要专门起草一份文件

translation.en: that specifically outlines the punishment for what I just did.
translation.zh: 来说明针对我刚才所犯罪行的惩罚

translation.en: But for now, I bid you adieu.
translation.zh: 但现在 我们后会有期

translation.en: Sic semper my dick, bitches!
translation.zh: 这就是暴君的下场 贱人们！

translation.en: This is the weirdest show.
translation.zh: 这真是场奇怪的表演

translation.en: Abe. [spits] Abe, are you okay?
translation.zh: 亚伯 你没事吧？

translation.en: -No, my throat has been roadhoused. -[spitting] Ah, it's in my mouth.
translation.zh: -有事 我的喉咙破了个大洞 -喷到我嘴里了

translation.en: I'm dying, George.
translation.zh: 我要死了 乔治

translation.en: No, you will not die! You shut your mouth!
translation.zh: 不 你不会死！闭嘴！

translation.en: -I will shut my mouth. -[spitting]
translation.zh: 我会闭嘴的

translation.en: -Forever. -Stop it! [spits]
translation.zh: -永远闭嘴 -别说了！

translation.en: -Abe, you're gonna make it. -Yes, to the other side.
translation.zh: -亚伯 你会撑过去的 -我会到另一边去

translation.en: No! Back to this side! Where you belong!
translation.zh: 不！回到这边！你属于这里！

translation.en: George, you must free the colonies.
translation.zh: 乔治 你一定要解放殖民地

translation.en: No! That's your thing, Abe. It's not mine.
translation.zh: 不！那是你该做的事 亚伯 不是我

translation.en: It's yours now, George. I believe in you.
translation.zh: 现在要靠你了 乔治 我相信你

translation.en: -[spits] -Free the colonies.
translation.zh: 解放殖民地

translation.en: Found a new country.
translation.zh: 建立新国家

translation.en: Name her…
translation.zh: 把它命名为…

translation.en: Name her what, babe? You tell me what you want me to name her.
translation.zh: 把它命名为什么 亲爱的？ 告诉我你想叫它什么

translation.en: God damn it! You son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 该死！你这个混蛋！

translation.en: Whatever you tell me to name her, that's what I'm gonna name her, Abie!
translation.zh: 你让我叫它什么 我就叫它什么 亲爱的亚伯！

translation.en: Name her America.
translation.zh: 叫它美利坚

translation.en: Is that your top choice?
translation.zh: 这就是你的首选？

translation.en: We can spitball some options, see if we can beat it.
translation.zh: 我们可再讨论几个选项 看有没有更好的

translation.en: There is no time, George.
translation.zh: 没时间了 乔治

translation.en: My death-shit is imminent.
translation.zh: 我的死期已至

translation.en: America, okay? Just remember…
translation.zh: 就叫美利坚 好吗？记住…

translation.en: -[groans and farts] America. -[eagle screeches]
translation.zh: 美利坚

translation.en: A-- [gags]
translation.zh: 亚伯…不

translation.en: Okay, hold it. Abe!
translation.zh: 好吧 稍等 亚伯！

translation.en: Stand ready.
translation.zh: 准备好

translation.en: A vengeful Washington will be here in three, two…
translation.zh: 复仇心切的华盛顿到场还有三、二…

translation.en: Hey, dickhole! It's time to… Oh, fuck me.
translation.zh: 嘿 混蛋！是时候…操

translation.en: Yes. Fuck you, indeed.
translation.zh: 没错 操的就是你

translation.en: Subdue him. I wish to shame him with a cutting dialogue.
translation.zh: 控制住他 我要用污言秽语羞辱他

translation.en: -[cracks neck] -Hello, guv.
translation.zh: 你好 长官

translation.en: [Benedict] I know betrayal hurts, Georgie,
translation.zh: 我知道遭背叛的滋味不好受 小乔治

translation.en: and it can often rile in a man motivation he didn't even know he had.
translation.zh: 它通常能把 一个人不自知的斗志激发出来

translation.en: But face facts. With Abe and the rest of your revolutionaries gone,
translation.zh: 但是面对现实吧 没有了亚伯和你其他那些革命友人

translation.en: on account of me having killed them all just now,
translation.zh: 因为我刚刚杀了他们所有人 你们这些疲惫、只懂玩乐的滑稽小子

translation.en: your tired, party-boy antics are bound to fail.
translation.zh: 因为我刚刚杀了他们所有人 你们这些疲惫、只懂玩乐的滑稽小子 注定会失败

translation.en: You'll never be the leader Abe was.
translation.zh: 你永远无法成为亚伯那样的领袖

translation.en: Because you lack Abe's brains, his heart,
translation.zh: 因为你没有亚伯那样的脑子、心肠

translation.en: and, most importantly, his soul.
translation.zh: 还有最重要的一点 他的灵魂

translation.en: Without him, the revolution is dead.
translation.zh: 没有他 革命就完了

translation.en: That cherry tree didn't chop its fucking self down!
translation.zh: 那棵樱桃树不是被自己砍倒的！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们上！

translation.en: Ah, are you a miniboss, or what? Do something!
translation.zh: 你是游戏里的小怪吗？做点什么啊！

translation.en: Jesus Christ!
translation.zh: 老天爷啊！

translation.en: Transporter, go!
translation.zh: 运输者 快走！

translation.en: Let's get you transported.
translation.zh: 马上运送

translation.en: I can't believe we ever let you into the Three Fuckateers!
translation.zh: 我不敢相信 我们曾经让你加入了三个手枪手！

translation.en: I'm changing our Netflix password!
translation.zh: 我要把我们的网飞密码改掉！

translation.en: Transporter, the bridge!
translation.zh: 运输者 走大桥！

translation.en: Fuckin' bridges.
translation.zh: 该死的桥

translation.en: Ah, Christ.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [George] What now?
translation.zh: 又怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, Georgie, I almost forgot.
translation.zh: 小乔治 我差点忘了

translation.en: I have something from your king.
translation.zh: 你的国王有东西让我给你

translation.en: This is for you.
translation.zh: 这是给你的

translation.en: "This is for you." [continues laughing] I'm so clever!
translation.zh: “这是给你的” 我太聪明了！

translation.en: [George] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: This is for…
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: America!
translation.zh: 为了美利坚！

translation.en: [man] Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: 你他妈闭嘴！

translation.en: -[smacks lips] Yep. -[dog barks distantly]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Martha singing] ♪ Close your eyes ♪
translation.zh: 闭上双眼

translation.en: ♪ Give me your hand, darling ♪
translation.zh: 把手给我 亲爱的

translation.en: ♪ Do you feel my heart beating? ♪
translation.zh: 感受到我的心跳了吗？

translation.en: ♪ Do you understand? ♪
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: ♪ Do you feel the same? ♪
translation.zh: 你能感同身受吗？

translation.en: ♪ Am I only dreaming? ♪
translation.zh: 我只是在做梦吗？

translation.en: ♪ Is this burnin' ♪
translation.zh: （宝贝 坚持住！） 这是否燃起了永恒之火？

translation.en: ♪ An eternal flame? ♪
translation.zh: 这是否燃起了永恒之火？

translation.en: He sewed it by hand
translation.zh: 这是他亲手缝的

translation.en: when Trishelle came down with dengue fever last May Day.
translation.zh: 那是去年的五朔节 崔谢尔得了登革热

translation.en: He laid it upon her and she healed.
translation.zh: 他给她盖上 她就痊愈了

translation.en: And now, she lays it upon him,
translation.zh: 现在她为他盖上

translation.en: but he will never heal.
translation.zh: 但他再也不会痊愈了

translation.en: John 3:16.
translation.zh: 约翰福音第3章第16节

translation.en: A gift from Mozart himself.
translation.zh: 一份来自莫扎特的礼物

translation.en: Silenced now, like its owner, forever.
translation.zh: 现在和它的主人一样永远沉寂了

translation.en: You're, uh-- [clears throat] Martha Dandridge.
translation.zh: 你是玛莎丹德里奇

translation.en: You were there that night, on stage.
translation.zh: 那晚你在台上

translation.en: And you are George Washington, inventor of peanut butter.
translation.zh: 你是乔治华盛顿 花生酱的发明人

translation.en: The same.
translation.zh: 幸会

translation.en: Abraham Lincoln's best friend.
translation.zh: 亚伯拉罕林肯最好的朋友

translation.en: [whispers] Forever.
translation.zh: 永远的挚友

translation.en: You've suffered a tremendous loss.
translation.zh: 你失去了重要的友人

translation.en: You should not be alone tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚你不该孤独一人

translation.en: -Yes! Yes! -Ah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: -Uh… -What is it? You can tell me, Martha.
translation.zh: 怎么了？告诉我 玛莎

translation.en: -You can tell me anything. -Well… [breathing heavily]
translation.zh: -什么事你都可以跟我说 -这个…

translation.en: -I'm pregnant. -What? Just now?
translation.zh: -我怀孕了 -什么？刚刚怀的？

translation.en: -Yeah. -You're sure?
translation.zh: -是的 -你确定？

translation.en: -A woman knows. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 女人对这种事很敏感

translation.en: A miracle has befallen us!
translation.zh: 奇迹降临在了我们身上！

translation.en: -Has it? -It has! Yes.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的！没错

translation.en: Oh, but has it?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: All I've ever wanted, Martha,
translation.zh: 这是我一直梦寐以求的 玛莎

translation.en: was the one thing I never had, a loving family.
translation.zh: 我未曾拥有的便是一个有爱的家庭

translation.en: -Gross, you were an orphan? -What?
translation.zh: -哎呦 你是个孤儿？ -什么？

translation.en: -Of course not! God, no. Ew. -Ugh! Phew!
translation.zh: 当然不是！天啊 不是

translation.en: No, but look, my father was a real man's man,
translation.zh: 不 听我说 我父亲是个大男子主义的人

translation.en: which is to say, like all men's men,
translation.zh: 也就是说和其他大男子主义者一样

translation.en: he disrespected my mother and punished me for his insecurities.
translation.zh: 他不尊重我的母亲 为自己的不安而惩罚我

translation.en: And see, this will be a great opportunity to break that cycle, if you will.
translation.zh: 你看 如果你同意 这就是打破恶性循环的绝好机会

translation.en: You know, there can be no spring without winter. John 3:16.
translation.zh: 不历寒冬 何来春风 约翰福音第3章第16节

translation.en: That's beautiful, George.
translation.zh: 真好 乔治

translation.en: Oh, hey, what's this?
translation.zh: 嘿 这是什么？

translation.en: Oh. [chuckles]
translation.zh: （角色背景故事）

translation.en: Just [sighs] a box of misty water-colored memories.
translation.zh: 就是一盒充满昔日情怀的回忆

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, look, the day we first met.
translation.zh: 看 我和亚伯相遇的第一天

translation.en: I was hiding from my father in the woods,
translation.zh: 我在树林里躲我父亲

translation.en: and he had been drinking and listening to Kid Rock again.
translation.zh: 他又在边喝酒边听摇滚小子的歌了

translation.en: And then, I encountered a boy, no older than me,
translation.zh: 然后我遇到一个男孩 年纪不比我大

translation.en: and he smelled of possums and night soil.
translation.zh: 闻起来像负鼠和夜晚的泥土

translation.en: We couldn't have been any more different. And yet, he opened up his arms to me
translation.zh: 我们截然不同 但他对我敞开胸怀

translation.en: and he took me up into his tree home.
translation.zh: 带我去他的树屋

translation.en: It was the first time that I understood what family was.
translation.zh: 那是我第一次明白家人的含义

translation.en: Aw… #Blessed.
translation.zh: 标签 三生有幸

translation.en: [George chuckles] This is his seventh birthday.
translation.zh: 这是他的七岁生日

translation.en: I had to get him a hat to cover that hideous, malformed head of his.
translation.zh: 我得给他买一顶帽子 遮一遮那畸形的怪脑袋

translation.en: Who could have known that it would come to be his trademark?
translation.zh: 谁能想到这成了他的标志？

translation.en: Oh, prom! Wow!
translation.zh: 舞会！哇！

translation.en: We lost our virginities that night. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那晚我们失去了童贞

translation.en: -Together. -Oh, I get it.
translation.zh: -一起 -我懂了

translation.en: I've been to Paris.
translation.zh: 我去过巴黎

translation.en: Oh, man, we had so many plans.
translation.zh: 天啊 我们计划过很多事情

translation.en: Oh, Sky Camp! Junior Templar Scouts.
translation.zh: 飞天营 少年圣堂骑士童子军

translation.en: [gasps] Our semi-pro rolling-circle-with-a-stick team.
translation.zh: 我们的半专业木棍滚铁圈团队

translation.en: What is this even… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这是什么啊…

translation.en: -The famed "Lincoln Log!" [laughs] -[chuckles] Yes!
translation.zh: -著名的“林肯圆木”！ -对！

translation.en: Abe, [laughs] you rapscallion.
translation.zh: 亚伯 你这个流氓

translation.en: You rapscallion. [sobbing]
translation.zh: 你这个流氓

translation.en: George.
translation.zh: 乔治

translation.en: -Oh, George. George! -[George] What?
translation.zh: 乔治！

translation.en: -What? -You know what you must do.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -你知道你该做什么吧？

translation.en: Have a bunch more sex with you until I start feeling better?
translation.zh: 继续和你做爱 直到我感觉好受些为止？

translation.en: -That'll work in the short term. -[sobs] Okay, that's a great idea.
translation.zh: -这只能短期有效 -好吧 好主意

translation.en: No, no… No! George.
translation.zh: 不！乔治

translation.en: You must avenge Abe.
translation.zh: 你必须为亚伯报仇

translation.en: See his dream through.
translation.zh: 实现他的梦想

translation.en: I can't! King James is more powerful than ever.
translation.zh: 我做不到！ 詹姆斯国王现在前所未有地强大

translation.en: -I can't fight him alone. -No, you need partners.
translation.zh: -我一个人打不过他 -对 你需要伙伴

translation.en: -Partners? -Yes!
translation.zh: -伙伴？ -对！

translation.en: -Partners in the revolution? -Yes!
translation.zh: -革命的伙伴？ -对！

translation.en: Partners whose spirit, like mine,
translation.zh: 这些伙伴的精神要像我一样

translation.en: outweigh their sense of self-preservation and sanity, even?
translation.zh: 强过他们的自我保护意识 甚至是理智？

translation.en: Yes! You know, Samuel Adams plays in my adult kickball league.
translation.zh: 对！塞缪尔亚当斯 在我的成人足垒球联盟踢球

translation.en: -I totally know him. -Hold the phone!
translation.zh: 我很了解他 等一哈！塞缪尔亚登斯 是个赛车手 你认识他？

translation.en: Samuel Adems is the race car driver. You know him?
translation.zh: 等一哈！塞缪尔亚登斯 是个赛车手 你认识他？

translation.en: What's a phone? And no, no, no, no. [laughs]
translation.zh: “一哈”是什么？不

translation.en: That's Samuel Adems, with an "E."
translation.zh: 那是塞缪尔亚登斯 “登”

translation.en: This is Samuel Adams, with an "A."
translation.zh: 我说的是塞缪尔亚当斯 “当”

translation.en: [whispers] The rabble rouser.
translation.zh: 一个善于煽动人心的家伙

translation.en: Sammy Addy from way downtown!
translation.zh: 城里来的山米亚迪！

translation.en: Fuck, yeah!
translation.zh: 操 好耶！

translation.en: [George] Boffo fireworks, Mr. Adams.
translation.zh: 绝妙的烟火 亚当斯先生

translation.en: Very, very boffo. I'm George Washington.
translation.zh: 非常妙 我是乔治华盛顿

translation.en: George Washington, the dinosaur rancher?
translation.zh: 乔治华盛顿 那个养恐龙的？

translation.en: Ah, no, no, that's George Washingten, with an "E."
translation.zh: 不 那是乔治华盛登 “登”

translation.en: I'm George Washington, with an "O," the future king of America.
translation.zh: 我是乔治华盛顿 “顿” 美利坚未来的王

translation.en: America? What the fuck is America, bro?
translation.zh: 美利坚？ 美利坚是什么玩意儿 老兄？

translation.en: [dude-bro 1] Yeah, what is it?
translation.zh: -是啊 啥玩意？ -啥玩意？

translation.en: [yells] Fucking tell us!
translation.zh: 快他妈告诉我们！

translation.en: Today, but the final whispered word of a dying man.
translation.zh: 今天 它只是 一个垂死之人的喃喃遗言

translation.en: But a year from now, with your help, the most powerful country in the world.
translation.zh: 但一年以后 在你们的帮助下 它将成为全世界最强大的国家

translation.en: A country free of British rule.
translation.zh: 一个免受英国统治的国家

translation.en: Oh, fuck, man! I hate the British.
translation.zh: 操！我讨厌英国佬

translation.en: They're always breaking up our peaceable free assemblies.
translation.zh: 他们总是打乱我们的和平自由集会

translation.en: -Bro! Bro! Bro! -[whooping]
translation.zh: 兄弟！

translation.en: Our parties.
translation.zh: 我们的派对

translation.en: I call them "the fun police." [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我管他们叫“扫兴军团”

translation.en: -[dude-bro 1] Who would do that? -"The fun police."
translation.zh: -谁会这么干啊？ -“扫兴军团”

translation.en: That is exactly what Abe used to call them!
translation.zh: 以前亚伯正是这么叫他们的！

translation.en: They hassle us because we like to blow shit up
translation.zh: 他们骚扰我们 是因为我们喜欢捣乱

translation.en: and get into fights with anybody who looks different than us.
translation.zh: 和看起来与我们不同的人打架

translation.en: [all] Yeah!
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: -Yeah, we're being oppressed! -Well, I mean--
translation.zh: -对 我们受到了压迫！ -我的意思是…

translation.en: Hell, we'd still be partying right now if they hadn't shut us down last night.
translation.zh: 可恶 要不是昨晚他们打断我们 我们现在还在开派对呢

translation.en: It's 'cause of my beer.
translation.zh: 都是因为我的啤酒

translation.en: -The British, they just can't handle it. -[dude-bro 1] Yeah.
translation.zh: -英国佬受不了这个 -是的

translation.en: -Beer? -[all] Beer!
translation.zh: -啤酒？ -啤酒！

translation.en: It's made from rotten grass. Try this shit.
translation.zh: 是用烂草酿的 尝尝这玩意儿

translation.en: You're gonna love it.
translation.zh: （操他妈的啤酒） 你会喜欢的

translation.en: You don't even have to put cow dick milk in it.
translation.zh: 你都不用在里面加牛鸡巴奶

translation.en: -Cow dick milk. Right. -This guy gets it.
translation.zh: -牛鸡巴奶 好吧 -这家伙懂的

translation.en: E Pluribus Unum, that's good!
translation.zh: 合众为一 好喝！

translation.en: Right? Brits know, when this shit hits the market,
translation.zh: 是吧？英国佬明白 一旦这玩意儿进入市场

translation.en: their whole tea economy's gonna fucking implode.
translation.zh: 他们的整个茶叶经济就要完蛋了

translation.en: They're shitting in their pantaloons and it's diarrhea.
translation.zh: 他们吓得屁滚尿流 还拉肚子

translation.en: So, we share an enemy. A cause.
translation.zh: 所以我们有共同的敌人 同一个目标

translation.en: And I can see plainly that you share my testicular fortitude.
translation.zh: 我还能看出 你和我一样刚

translation.en: I'll be honest with you, dude. I eat whatever I want.
translation.zh: 跟你说实话 老兄 我想吃什么吃什么

translation.en: I never work out. I'm basically jacked from fucking.
translation.zh: 我从来不健身 身材全靠活塞运动

translation.en: No shit! Your arms are bigger than your fuckin' thighs.
translation.zh: 不是吧！你的胳膊比大腿还粗

translation.en: -Look at those things. -That is a birth defect.
translation.zh: -看看啊 -这是先天不足

translation.en: Look, I have to ask. Do you have any skills?
translation.zh: 我不得不问 你有什么技能吗？

translation.en: Skills that would, maybe, help win a war?
translation.zh: 能在打仗时帮上忙的技能？

translation.en: Whoo! Pow! Pow! Pow! Pow! Bingo!
translation.zh: 击中！

translation.en: Those the kind of skills you might be interested in, bruh?
translation.zh: 你可能对这些技能感兴趣？

translation.en: Indubitably, my friend.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 我的朋友

translation.en: You pack quite the punch, Samuel Adams with an "A."
translation.zh: 你很猛 塞缪尔亚当斯 “当”仁不让

translation.en: [chuckles] You're damn right, I do.
translation.zh: 你说得没错 确实

translation.en: And I hope you got room for everybody.
translation.zh: 我希望你能让大家都加入

translation.en: 'Cause whatever I do, wherever I go,
translation.zh: 因为无论我做什么 去哪里

translation.en: I do and go with every single one of my fraternity brothers.
translation.zh: 都要和每一位兄弟会兄弟在一起

translation.en: Where we at, boys?
translation.zh: 在哪儿呢 小子们？

translation.en: All right, pledges, circle up and grab some thumb lube.
translation.zh: 好了 各位忠心考核申请人 围成圈 搞点拇指润滑油

translation.en: -Yeah! -[all cheering]
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: Thumbs up their ass!
translation.zh: 大拇指捅他们屁眼！

translation.en: You know what? You know what?
translation.zh: 这样吧 我突然想起来

translation.en: It's just occurring to me now, it is hell week.
translation.zh: 这样吧 我突然想起来 现在是表忠心周 这些家伙忙得很

translation.en: These guys are gonna be so busy.
translation.zh: 现在是表忠心周 这些家伙忙得很

translation.en: -Uh, okay. -And covered in cum.
translation.zh: -好吧 -马上要浑身精液

translation.en: I'm sorry, what?
translation.zh: 不好意思 什么？

translation.en: I'm gonna tell them to catch up later. Where to? What's the plan?
translation.zh: 我让他们随后再来 去哪儿？计划是什么？

translation.en: Well, our team is not yet complete.
translation.zh: 我们的团队还不完整

translation.en: To travel this great country, we're gonna need a horseman.
translation.zh: 要穿越这个伟大的国家 我们需要一位骑手

translation.en: The best in the colonies.
translation.zh: 殖民地最佳骑手

translation.en: But where to find such a man?
translation.zh: 但要去哪儿找这样一个人？

translation.en: Oh, I know a place.
translation.zh: 我知道个地方

translation.en: So, I don't know, how do we even know which one's the best horseman?
translation.zh: 我不太懂 我们怎么知道 谁是最好的骑手？

translation.en: Oh, you'll know, bro.
translation.zh: 你会知道的 兄弟

translation.en: These guys live their lives one quarter mule at a time.
translation.zh: 这些家伙的人生 只活在每次四分之一骡子的竞速之中

translation.en: Who is that?
translation.zh: 那是谁？

translation.en: Paul Revere!
translation.zh: 保罗列维尔！

translation.en: [grunts] Sorry about the horse, Paul.
translation.zh: 马的事我很抱歉 保罗

translation.en: [George] Mr. Revere? Sir?
translation.zh: 列维尔先生？阁下？

translation.en: Sir Revere, your country needs you.
translation.zh: 列维尔阁下 你的国家需要你

translation.en: Hi! I won the race!
translation.zh: 你好！我赢了比赛！

translation.en: Did you see me? I'm good at horses.
translation.zh: 你看到我了吗？我擅长和马打交道

translation.en: Who are you guys? Will you be my new human friends?
translation.zh: 你们是谁？ 你们是我的新人类朋友吗？

translation.en: I mean, new just friends,
translation.zh: 我是说 新朋友

translation.en: because I have tons of human friends already,
translation.zh: 因为我已经有很多人类朋友

translation.en: and not just horse friends. [laughs nervously]
translation.zh: 不只有马朋友

translation.en: Ooh, I see what I did here. Now, this is my bad.
translation.zh: 我知道我做了什么了 是我不好

translation.en: -[sirens blaring] -Cheese it! It's the fun police!
translation.zh: 快跑！是扫兴军团！

translation.en: [man] Go, man! Redcoat!
translation.zh: 快走 伙计！是英军！

translation.en: Go! Let's get outta here! Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 走！我们快离开这儿！快！

translation.en: Ah, the British are such a drag.
translation.zh: 英国人真讨厌

translation.en: They're like the world's shittiest stepdad.
translation.zh: 他们是世界上最糟糕的继父

translation.en: That's what my dad sounds like. If I was raised by horses.
translation.zh: 我爸爸就是这声儿 搞得我像是被马养大的一样

translation.en: But I definitely wasn't. I have a human dad, just like you guys. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 但我显然不是 我有个人类爸爸 和你们一样

translation.en: [Samuel] Yeah, great.
translation.zh: 嗯 很好

translation.en: And that's why we're best friends, right?
translation.zh: 所以我们是最好的朋友 对吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Sure, bud.
translation.zh: 对 当然 兄弟

translation.en: Listen, if we're gonna have any shot at this at all,
translation.zh: 听我说 如果想赢

translation.en: we need more pledges. I'm talking real heavy hitters.
translation.zh: 我们必须让更多兄弟会成员加入 我说的是真正的重磅人物

translation.en: Oh, you know what?
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: I heard they got a sorcerer in the square, lighting it up tonight.
translation.zh: 我听说他们抓到一个巫师 今晚要在广场上烧死

translation.en: [man] Wanted in all-- [Samuel] Oh, "lighting it up." [chuckles] Okay.
translation.zh: -在全部13个殖民地通缉… -“把火点燃” 好

translation.en: Having committed heresy in the eyes of our Lord and Savior, King James,
translation.zh: 在我们的主、救世主、詹姆斯国王 眼皮底下宣传异端邪说

translation.en: the condemned is found guilty of the crimes of…
translation.zh: 罪人犯下的罪行有…

translation.en: creating a hypothesis, testing that hypothesis,
translation.zh: 创造假说、测验假说

translation.en: and drawing conclusions that refine that hypothesis.
translation.zh: 得出完善假说的结论

translation.en: Thomas Edison, for these crimes of practicing science-craft,
translation.zh: 托马斯爱迪生 犯下进行科学实践的罪行

translation.en: you are hereby sentenced to death by fire.
translation.zh: 你因此被判火刑

translation.en: Well, shit. What are we gonna do now?
translation.zh: 该死 我们现在要怎么办？

translation.en: How do you feel about endurance magicians?
translation.zh: 你对挑战忍耐力极限的 魔术师怎么看？

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！

translation.en: -[woman screaming] -The demon is resistant to fire-- Oh!
translation.zh: 恶魔对火免疫…

translation.en: Wow! This guy, am I right?
translation.zh: 哇！好家伙 我说得没错吧？

translation.en: -I vote we never piss him off. -[both] Agreed.
translation.zh: -我投票 永远不要惹毛他 -同意

translation.en: Vote passed.
translation.zh: 投票通过

translation.en: -[all] Fuckin' democracy! -[eagle screeches]
translation.zh: 该死的民主！

translation.en: We're doin' it!
translation.zh: 我们上！

translation.en: Thomas Edison, you are said to be
translation.zh: 托马斯爱迪生 据说

translation.en: the preeminent sorcerer in all the colonies,
translation.zh: 你是所有殖民地最卓越的巫师

translation.en: eons ahead of all your contemporaries.
translation.zh: 比你的同龄人强到不知道哪里去了

translation.en: We seek to recruit you for a mission.
translation.zh: 我们想雇佣你参与一个任务

translation.en: We literally cannot succeed without you!
translation.zh: 没有你 我们真的无法成功！

translation.en: What the--
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Were you expecting someone else?
translation.zh: 对不起 你们想找的是其他人吗？

translation.en: Oh, shit. Oh, shit. It's a chick. It's a chick!
translation.zh: 哦 要死 是个丫头

translation.en: I'm sorry. There's been a bit of a mix-up, I think?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我想是不是搞错了？

translation.en: Yeah, no such luck, dorks.
translation.zh: 没这种可能 傻子

translation.en: You're looking for Thomas Edison, ya got her.
translation.zh: 你们要找托马斯爱迪生 我就是

translation.en: But Thomas is a man's name.
translation.zh: 但托马斯是个男名

translation.en: I mean, my name is Thomas, so…
translation.zh: 我就叫托马斯 所以…

translation.en: Impossible! I have to say the obvious.
translation.zh: 不可能！我要说一件很明显的事

translation.en: -What is wrong with your skin? -What's wrong with my skin?
translation.zh: -你的皮肤怎么了？ -我的皮肤怎么了？

translation.en: What is wrong… I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你的皮肤…抱歉

translation.en: [yelling] What is wrong with your skin?
translation.zh: 你的皮肤怎么了？

translation.en: Whoa! Bro, take it easy.
translation.zh: 老兄 冷静点

translation.en: Don't worry, I can handle this.
translation.zh: 别担心 我能应付

translation.en: There is nothing wrong with my skin. I'm Chinese.
translation.zh: 我的皮肤没问题 我是中国人

translation.en: -Huh? -I'm from China. -Huh? -I'm an immigrant.
translation.zh: 我来自中国 我是个移民

translation.en: I came here from another country. Like you.
translation.zh: 我从另一个国家来到这里 和你一样

translation.en: Oh, no! No, no, no. My people have always been here.
translation.zh: 哦 不！不是的 我们的人民一直住在这儿

translation.en: That's why we make the rules, baby!
translation.zh: 所以我们说了算 宝贝！

translation.en: [scoffs] Except you don't, dumbass.
translation.zh: 你们说的才不算 傻瓜

translation.en: Ooh, you got burned!
translation.zh: 你被怼了！

translation.en: Isn't that why you've come to me?
translation.zh: 你们不就是为了这个来找我的吗？

translation.en: Because you need help toppling the British?
translation.zh: 因为你们需要我帮忙推翻英国人？

translation.en: Yes! [chuckles] Exactly! That is… Wait, how did you know that?
translation.zh: 对！没错！就是… 等等 你怎么知道？

translation.en: Word travels fast in these parts, George Washington with an "O."
translation.zh: 这里消息传得很快 乔治华盛顿

translation.en: I… I don't know. Now that I'm thinking about it,
translation.zh: 我不确定 现在想一想

translation.en: sorcerers are so 1775, am I right?
translation.zh: 巫师是1775年的产物 是不是？

translation.en: Cool, because I'm not a sorcerer.
translation.zh: 很好 因为我不是巫师

translation.en: I'm a scientist.
translation.zh: 我是科学家

translation.en: There's no such thing as science.
translation.zh: 科学根本不存在

translation.en: Oh, my God, did you guys hear that?
translation.zh: 哦 我的天 你们听到了吗？

translation.en: -Really? No such thing as science, huh? -[Samuel] Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？科学不存在？ -是啊

translation.en: Then what do you call this?
translation.zh: 那你们管这个叫什么？

translation.en: Science!
translation.zh: 科学！

translation.en: -Yay! -Yeah, I call them conduction gloves.
translation.zh: 我叫它传导手套

translation.en: The science is simple, really. They harness the subatomic--
translation.zh: 科学很简单 真的 手套利用亚原子…

translation.en: Oh, wait, no, don't tell us, dude. That's gonna ruin the trick.
translation.zh: 等等 不 不要告诉我们 伙计 这样魔术就没意思了

translation.en: Yeah, it's more fun not to know!
translation.zh: 对 不知道反而更有趣！

translation.en: Okay, guys, let's put our heads together here on this one.
translation.zh: 好 让我们一起来商量一下

translation.en: There's gotta be another Thomas Edison, right?
translation.zh: 肯定还有另一个托马斯爱迪生 对不对？

translation.en: Like a man Thomas Edison.
translation.zh: 一个男版托马斯爱迪生

translation.en: Oh, yeah, there is. There's Thomas Edisen with an "E,"
translation.zh: 对 有 有个托马斯爱登生 “登”

translation.en: the professional wrestler.
translation.zh: 专业摔跤手

translation.en: Ah, that's him. Let's go get him.
translation.zh: 就是他 我们去找他吧

translation.en: He's cool. Big dude. Wears spandex, if you're into that.
translation.zh: 他挺好的 大个子 爱穿莱卡紧身衣 如果你们有兴趣的话

translation.en: But he can't help you defeat an entire army. I can.
translation.zh: 但他无法帮你们打败一整支军队 我可以

translation.en: You would stand with us against the British?
translation.zh: 你要和我们一起对抗英国人？

translation.en: [inhales] Bet your ass. Those guys suck.
translation.zh: 当然 那些家伙糟透了

translation.en: I'm just doing science.
translation.zh: 我只是在研究科学

translation.en: And because they don't understand it, they want to kill me?
translation.zh: 因为他们不懂 就要杀掉我？

translation.en: Man, fuck those dicks.
translation.zh: 可去他们的吧

translation.en: Science is supposed to be fun and they're ruining it.
translation.zh: 科学本应很有趣 都被他们毁了

translation.en: Yeah, right? We even call 'em the fun police.
translation.zh: 是吧？我们甚至管他们叫扫兴军团

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, man, that's good. Can I use that?
translation.zh: 天啊 真好笑 我也可以这么叫他们吗？

translation.en: Uh, no.
translation.zh: 没…

translation.en: Problem. No problem.
translation.zh: 问题 没问题

translation.en: So, Edison, you're obviously a great thinker.
translation.zh: 好 爱迪生 你脑子肯定特别好使

translation.en: What would you have us do now?
translation.zh: 你现在要我们做什么？

translation.en: [scoffs] James has got eyes and ears everywhere.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯到处都有眼线

translation.en: If we're gonna blow up his spot,
translation.zh: 如果我们要炸掉他的据点

translation.en: we need someone who knows this land better than James.
translation.zh: 就需要找到 比詹姆斯更了解这片土地的人

translation.en: You can't possibly be suggesting--
translation.zh: 你不会是说…

translation.en: [narrator] He was a tracker, best in the world,
translation.zh: 他曾是个举世无双的追踪者

translation.en: until he was sent to a British prison for a crime he didn't commit.
translation.zh: 却因莫须有的罪名被投入英国监狱

translation.en: Now, he prowls the badlands,
translation.zh: 如今 他在荒原潜行

translation.en: tracking for those who can't track for themselves.
translation.zh: 帮那些没法自己搞追踪的人搞追踪

translation.en: If you have a problem and you can find him,
translation.zh: 如果你有麻烦 而且能找到他

translation.en: -maybe you can hire Geronimo. -[eagle screeches]
translation.zh: 你也许可以雇佣杰罗尼莫

translation.en: All right, what do you chuds want?
translation.zh: 好了 你们这些右翼佬想干什么？

translation.en: Hey, you play lax, bro?
translation.zh: 嘿 你玩袋棍球吗 老兄？

translation.en: Seth-chee.
translation.zh: 白痴

translation.en: My people invented lacrosse, all right, bro?
translation.zh: 袋棍球是我的人民发明的 好吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Sure, man. Sure.
translation.zh: 当然 没错

translation.en: We come as friends, mighty Geronimo…
translation.zh: 我们是来交朋友的 伟大的杰罗尼莫…

translation.en: Nay, nay, we come as brothers.
translation.zh: 不 我们是来和你成为兄弟的

translation.en: Mmm, Just doesn't feel right. Feels like you're gonna try to fuck me.
translation.zh: 感觉不太对 你们好像是想耍我

translation.en: What? We wouldn't, never!
translation.zh: 什么？我们没有 绝对不会！

translation.en: Yeah, no, I think you might.
translation.zh: 是 不对 我觉得你们可能会

translation.en: Like, epically, all the way down to my descendants.
translation.zh: 一代又一代 一直影响到我的子孙后代

translation.en: I got a sixth sense for this shit.
translation.zh: 我对这种事有第六感

translation.en: No, our word is strong,
translation.zh: 不 我们一诺千金

translation.en: like your mighty Indian tribe, the, um… the…
translation.zh: 和你们伟大的 印第安部落一样 那个…

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: The Chicory?
translation.zh: 菊苣？

translation.en: Kay yay.
translation.zh: 妈呀

translation.en: Sha… Sass… Sasquatch! Sasquatch.
translation.zh: 大脚怪

translation.en: -Gotta be Sasquatch. There we go. -Yes.
translation.zh: -一定是大脚怪 没错 -对

translation.en: Our word is strong, like your mighty tribe, the Sasquatch.
translation.zh: 我们一诺千金 和你们伟大的大脚怪部落一样

translation.en: [groans] Fine. What do you want?
translation.zh: 好吧 你们想干什么？

translation.en: -We seek to topple the British. -I'm in.
translation.zh: -我们想推翻英国人 -算我一个

translation.en: -Now, hear us out-- -Again, I'm in.
translation.zh: -现在 听我们说… -我说了 算我一个

translation.en: -Not sure how much you know about them. -Uh, quite a bit.
translation.zh: -不知道你对他们了解多少 -很了解

translation.en: They are really, really shitty buzzkills.
translation.zh: 他们真的很会扫兴

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah, we call them, get this, here…
translation.zh: -真的？ -是的 我们叫他们 准备好…

translation.en: -Ready? The fun police. -"The fun police"?
translation.zh: -来吧？扫兴军团 -“扫兴军团”？

translation.en: Yeah. They all have all these rules.
translation.zh: 是的 他们有各种规定

translation.en: No one's allowed to have a single independent thought,
translation.zh: 不允许任何人有一点独立的想法

translation.en: and they're always taxing the shit out of everybody!
translation.zh: 而且对每个人收很多税！

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds rough.
translation.zh: 是么 听起来很惨

translation.en: [sniffs] My issue is just that they took my land,
translation.zh: 我的情况只不过是 他们把我们的土地夺走了

translation.en: poisoned my people to the brink of extinction,
translation.zh: 把我们的族人毒到濒临灭绝

translation.en: and murdered everyone I've ever cared for.
translation.zh: 把所有我在乎的人都杀了

translation.en: So… real buzzkill.
translation.zh: 所以…真的很扫兴

translation.en: That is classic fun police. Those guys have no chill.
translation.zh: 扫兴军团就是这样 那些家伙不懂娱乐

translation.en: -Right? -Chief Geronimo--
translation.zh: -是吧？ -杰罗尼莫酋长…

translation.en: -Just Geronimo is fine. -Just Geronimo--
translation.zh: -叫我杰罗尼莫就好 -杰罗尼莫就好…

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 哦 老天

translation.en: We can't give you back your family.
translation.zh: 我们无法让你死去的家人死而复生

translation.en: But join us and I promise you justice will finally be served.
translation.zh: 但加入我们 我向你保证正义终将得以伸张

translation.en: So, you're telling me that if I help you,
translation.zh: 你是说 如果我帮助你们

translation.en: when you win this land back from King James,
translation.zh: 等你们从詹姆斯国王那里赢回土地

translation.en: you'll give it back to me and my family?
translation.zh: 你就会把土地还给我和我的家人？

translation.en: -Absolutely. -[chuckles] Totally.
translation.zh: -当然 -完全正确

translation.en: -All of it? The whole enchilada? -Well, I mean--
translation.zh: -全部？完璧归赵？ -我是说…

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, you bet we will.
translation.zh: 对 我们当然会

translation.en: Sam, man, can I get a quick sidebar with you?
translation.zh: 山姆 我能到一边跟你说句话吗？

translation.en: You know what? I'm probably just being paranoid.
translation.zh: 可能是我多虑了吧

translation.en: So, what's the plan now, and does it involve Doritos?
translation.zh: 现在你们打算怎么做 需要用到玉米片吗？

translation.en: Nope, better.
translation.zh: 不 是更好的东西

translation.en: A handkerchief.
translation.zh: 一只手帕

translation.en: [Benedict] Greetings, Your Highness.
translation.zh: 您好 陛下

translation.en: May I be the first to welcome you to your New World?
translation.zh: 我可否有幸率先 迎接您到访您的新世界？

translation.en: You may dispense with the pleasantries, Arnold.
translation.zh: 不必拘礼 阿诺德

translation.en: Such as they are.
translation.zh: 和他们一样即可

translation.en: Yes, and this is, like, the nice part of town.
translation.zh: 是 这是城里比较好的地方

translation.en: Well, it smells like shit, which reminds me,
translation.zh: 闻起来像屎一样 这倒提醒我

translation.en: I need to make room for second breakfast.
translation.zh: 要给第二份早餐腾点空间

translation.en: I've had my fill of mushy peas and blood sausage.
translation.zh: 我吃够了豌豆泥和血肠

translation.en: [Benedict] Yes, accommodations at the top of your obelisk
translation.zh: 是 您方尖塔顶的膳宿

translation.en: are more well-suited, my king.
translation.zh: 会更妥当 我的国王

translation.en: Then, I can assume everything is proceeding as I have foreseen.
translation.zh: 看来一切都在照我的预期进行

translation.en: Yes, your plan is proceeding.
translation.zh: 是 您的计划正在执行中

translation.en: But we have had trouble
translation.zh: 但我们遇到了麻烦

translation.en: with a certain colonist not falling in line.
translation.zh: 有个殖民地居民不听话

translation.en: Well, has he read the rules?
translation.zh: 他读了那些规定吗？

translation.en: The rules should always be posted clearly in a public place
translation.zh: （规定：严禁代表权、自由、正义） 规定一定要清楚地公示在公共场合

translation.en: where everyone can read them.
translation.zh: 让大家都能看到

translation.en: Oh, can he… can he not read?
translation.zh: 他不认字吗？

translation.en: Well, no, he has read them, Your Highness.
translation.zh: 不 他读过了 陛下

translation.en: However, he has chosen not to follow them.
translation.zh: 然而他选择不遵守

translation.en: -[sputtering] But they are the rules! -I know!
translation.zh: -但规定就是规定！ -是啊！

translation.en: What is the point of being a ruler if people are not following your rules?
translation.zh: 如果人们不服从你的规定 做君主还有什么意义？

translation.en: This is, like, King Shit 101!
translation.zh: 这可是国王基础课程的内容！

translation.en: I understand, my king.
translation.zh: 我明白 我的国王

translation.en: Not following the…
translation.zh: 不遵守…

translation.en: [voice trembling] Arnold, why, do you know what this is?
translation.zh: 阿诺德 你知道不守规定叫什么吗？

translation.en: -I do. -It's rebellion!
translation.zh: -我知道 -这是反叛！

translation.en: By definition.
translation.zh: 顾名思义

translation.en: We cannot allow anything to stop my plan, Arnold!
translation.zh: 我们不能允许 任何事情阻碍我的计划 阿诺德！

translation.en: Crush this illiterate rebel scum!
translation.zh: 消灭这个不识字的反叛渣滓！

translation.en: It will be my pleasure.
translation.zh: 遵命

translation.en: Excellent.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: [Samuel] Dudes, are we close yet? I'm getting hangry.
translation.zh: 伙计们 我们快到了吗？ 我又饿又生气

translation.en: I could definitely eat.
translation.zh: 我很想吃东西

translation.en: Oh, I saw a Boston Wild Wings about a mile back.
translation.zh: 大约一英里之前 我看到一家波士顿辣翅吧

translation.en: What's a mile?
translation.zh: 英里是什么？

translation.en: And I could totally crush some B-dubs right now.
translation.zh: 我现在真的很想吃鸡翅

translation.en: Hey, hey! Knock it off, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿！别吵了 各位

translation.en: First, we start a revolution.
translation.zh: 首先 我们要开启一场革命

translation.en: Then we can have all the Boston Wild Wings
translation.zh: 然后鸡翅我们就可以想吃多少吃多少

translation.en: that we've ever dreamed of, just like our forefathers prophesized, okay?
translation.zh: 就像我们的祖先预言的那样

translation.en: Now, Geronimo, what do you got?
translation.zh: 好了 杰罗尼莫 你有什么发现？

translation.en: Uh, tracking isn't an exact science.
translation.zh: 追踪不是什么精密科学

translation.en: This is a handkerchief. What do you think I am? A dog?
translation.zh: 这是一条手帕 你以为我是什么？狗吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, I know this is a trick question,
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道这是个狡猾的问题

translation.en: so I'm gonna go with my immediate impulse. Yes.
translation.zh: 所以我按直觉来回答 是的

translation.en: Fuck you, dude. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 去你妈的 小子

translation.en: -Yeah, he's in there. -[redcoat 1] Ello, guv'ner.
translation.zh: -对 他在里面 -你好 长官

translation.en: -[redcoat 2] Ello, guv'ner. -Ello, guv!
translation.zh: -你好 长官 -你好 长官！ （越南）

translation.en: [all] Ello, guv'ner.
translation.zh: 你好吗 长官？

translation.en: All right, that's a lot of men.
translation.zh: 好吧 人真多

translation.en: And it's a sure bet that there's even more inside.
translation.zh: 里面肯定有更多人

translation.en: Wait, are we seriously thinkin' about goin' in there?
translation.zh: 等等 我们真的要进去吗？

translation.en: -Look at this place! It's a quagmire! -[all] Guv'ner!
translation.zh: -看看这里！简直是贼窝！ -长官！

translation.en: Guys, we could be here for years and accomplish nothing.
translation.zh: 各位 我们在这里待上再多年头 也只会一事无成

translation.en: You're right. But we'd be accomplishing nothing…
translation.zh: 你说得对 但我们的一事无成…

translation.en: for America.
translation.zh: 是为了美利坚

translation.en: Guys, I can't ask you to go in there with me.
translation.zh: 各位 我没法要求你们和我一起进去

translation.en: -Yeah, good, because no. -Great. Good luck.
translation.zh: -好的 因为我不要去 -很好 祝你好运

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, wait, hold on. I thought I'd be all like, "No, don't. I can do it."
translation.zh: 等等 我以为会是我说 “不 没事 我可以”

translation.en: And then you guys would be like, "No, I'll come, don't worry."
translation.zh: 然后你们说 “不 我也去 别担心”

translation.en: I never know the right thing to say when I'm tryin' to lead. This sucks!
translation.zh: 我永远不知道做领导的时候该说什么 真糟糕！

translation.en: So, yeah, I guess I am. I'm asking you to go in there with me.
translation.zh: 所以好吧 我需要你们和我一起进去

translation.en: Will you please go in there with me?
translation.zh: 你们可以跟我一起去吗？

translation.en: Huh, well, with a pep talk like that, how could I say no?
translation.zh: 在这样一番激励演讲之后 我怎么能不去呢？

translation.en: Pfft, whatever. Let's just go kick some Redcoat ass!
translation.zh: 无所谓了 我们去把英军揍一顿吧！

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait! At least… Just let me do an entrance thing.
translation.zh: 等等 至少…让我来带头出场

translation.en: Ding dong! It's America, motherfucker!
translation.zh: 叮咚！美利坚来了 混蛋！

translation.en: Oh, Georgie! Well, color me surprised.
translation.zh: 小乔治！我真是没料到

translation.en: Oh, I'll color you fuckin' dead, Ben!
translation.zh: 我来给你料理后事 本！

translation.en: [laughs] Bravo! Did you practice that line in the car on your way here?
translation.zh: 说得好！这个段子 你是不是来的路上在车里练过了？

translation.en: What the fuck is a car?
translation.zh: 车是什么玩意儿？

translation.en: And, no, it was a rebuttal to something that you just said!
translation.zh: 没有 这是对你刚刚说的话的反驳！

translation.en: How could I have thought of it in advance
translation.zh: 我怎么可能提前想到

translation.en: if you said it just now and I came up with the perfect rebuttal?
translation.zh: 你刚刚会说这句话 然后想出完美的反驳？

translation.en: Oh, pardon me.
translation.zh: 原谅我

translation.en: I forgot you aren't versed in the gentlemanly art of debate,
translation.zh: 我忘了你并不熟悉绅士的辩论艺术

translation.en: like your best friend, Abe Lincoln.
translation.zh: 你最好的朋友亚伯林肯比较熟悉

translation.en: Oh, or should I say ex-best friend?
translation.zh: 或者我应该说 曾经最好的朋友？

translation.en: -Because he's dead. -Damn, he's good.
translation.zh: -因为他已经死了 -该死 他真会说

translation.en: -All right, fuck this. -[glass shatters]
translation.zh: 好了 够了

translation.en: -[motor revs] -[yelling] For Abe!
translation.zh: 为了亚伯！

translation.en: -[Samuel] Yippie-kay-yay, motherfu-- Whoa! -[electrical buzzing]
translation.zh: 哟呵 混蛋…

translation.en: -[Samuel] Watch it, witch! -[Edison] You watch it, dick!
translation.zh: -小心 女巫！ -你自己小心吧 白痴！

translation.en: [George] Yeah. Well, that could've gone better.
translation.zh: 好吧 本来可以更顺利的

translation.en: Ya think? Edison almost got everybody killed!
translation.zh: 是吗？爱迪生差点把大家都杀了！

translation.en: -Everybody almost got everybody killed! -Where's Arnold?
translation.zh: -每个人都差点把大家都杀了！ -阿诺德呢？

translation.en: And where's Geronimo? He smells like campfire.
translation.zh: 还有杰罗尼莫呢？ 他闻起来有篝火的味道

translation.en: You carry an unusual scent for a man.
translation.zh: 你身上是男人不太有的味道

translation.en: Almost like you're not a man at all, but a--
translation.zh: 就好像你根本不是个男人 而是个…

translation.en: Stay and fight, you dick!
translation.zh: 别跑 继续打啊 混蛋！

translation.en: Damn it! Oh, my God! Geronimo!
translation.zh: 该死！哦 我的天！杰罗尼莫！

translation.en: That bastard bit me!
translation.zh: 那个禽兽咬了我！

translation.en: It can't be. I thought they were just a myth.
translation.zh: 不可能 我以为他们是传说

translation.en: The Navajo have a name for their kind. Skinwalker.
translation.zh: 纳瓦霍人给他们命过名 叫皮行者

translation.en: I won't live with this curse.
translation.zh: 我不要带着这个诅咒活下去

translation.en: -Hand me my ax. -Are you sure?
translation.zh: -把我的斧子给我 -你确定吗？

translation.en: Does my grandfather shit in the woods?
translation.zh: 我爷爷在森林里拉过屎吗？

translation.en: Um, I… Does he? I didn't know him.
translation.zh: 我…他拉过吗？我不认识他

translation.en: It's what we call bears.
translation.zh: 这是我们对熊的称呼

translation.en: We call bears "grandfather."
translation.zh: 我们管熊叫“爷爷”

translation.en: Fuck it, just give me my ax!
translation.zh: 该死 把我的斧子给我！

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, Geronimo! What happened? Are you okay?
translation.zh: 杰罗尼莫！怎么回事？你没事吧？

translation.en: Go! I'll take care of him.
translation.zh: 快追！我来照顾他

translation.en: She's right, he's not important. Arnold's getting away!
translation.zh: 她说得对 他不重要 阿诺德要逃走了！

translation.en: No! No. We never leave a man behind.
translation.zh: 不！我们绝不能把队友落下

translation.en: Edison, dress that wound. Paul, call your horse.
translation.zh: 爱迪生 把伤口包扎起来 保罗 把你的马叫来

translation.en: Hey, Clyde!
translation.zh: 嘿 克莱德！

translation.en: -That way! -Run, Clyde, run!
translation.zh: -那边！ -克莱德 快跑！

translation.en: Welcome to hell… acopter?
translation.zh: 地狱欢迎光临…门一脚？

translation.en: I'm still working on it. I don't love it, but I don't hate it.
translation.zh: 我还在修改这个段子 我不喜欢它 但也不讨厌

translation.en: -[Edison] Paul, you were amazing. -[Paul] Aw, thank you, human lady friend.
translation.zh: -保罗 你太棒了 -谢谢你 女性人类朋友

translation.en: And, Sam, your propensity for murder is extraordinary.
translation.zh: 还有 山姆 你的杀戮倾向很突出

translation.en: Thank you. I took murder lessons from John Wick.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我跟约翰维克学习过杀戮课程

translation.en: -[gasps] The candle maker? -Yeah!
translation.zh: -那个做蜡烛的？ -对！

translation.en: That dude is a fuckin' psycho! [laughs]
translation.zh: 那家伙是个神经病！

translation.en: Yo, check it. The carriage stopped.
translation.zh: 哟 看看 马车停下了

translation.en: [George] But why would he stop here?
translation.zh: 可他为什么停在这里？

translation.en: The road to Delaware!
translation.zh: 通往特拉华的路！

translation.en: Sea-Doo, bitches!
translation.zh: 一个赛艇 贱人们！

translation.en: Paul, can your sizable steed clear that river?
translation.zh: 保罗 你的壮马能跃过这条河吗？

translation.en: -Only one way to find out. -[neighs]
translation.zh: 只有试试才知道

translation.en: In God I trust.
translation.zh: 我信仰上帝

translation.en: [Samuel] Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 哦 该死

translation.en: He shorted it, Paul. Hey, Paul, he shorted it.
translation.zh: 它跳得不够远 保罗 嘿 保罗 它不够远

translation.en: Clyde! His natural buoyancy can support us all!
translation.zh: 克莱德！它的自然浮力 可以支撑我们所有人！

translation.en: [George coughing] Jesus Christ! Did you know that your horse could swim that fast?
translation.zh: 老天爷！ 你知道你的马能游这么快吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, Clyde's a great swimmer.
translation.zh: 知道啊 克莱德很擅长游泳

translation.en: He's great at so many things. So proud!
translation.zh: 它擅长很多事 我很骄傲！

translation.en: Thank you, Geronimo. Your hair looks even better wet.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 杰罗尼莫 你的头发湿了更好看

translation.en: Y'all a bunch of idiots.
translation.zh: 你们这群蠢货

translation.en: [sighs] This feels like the end…
translation.zh: 我人生的…第一幕

translation.en: of the first act… of my life.
translation.zh: 感觉到头了

translation.en: All hope is lost.
translation.zh: 失去所有希望

translation.en: What do we even do now? Where do we go from here?
translation.zh: 我们现在怎么办？接下来要做什么？

translation.en: [gasps] Where we go isn't the question.
translation.zh: 去哪不是问题

translation.en: The question is,
translation.zh: 问题是 我们要主菜还是甜点？

translation.en: do we bring an entree or a fucking dessert?
translation.zh: 问题是 我们要主菜还是甜点？ （最高机密会议）

translation.en: [Edison] Oh, guys, Gettysburg is impossibly vast.
translation.zh: 各位 葛底斯堡非常辽阔

translation.en: Finding this address is like finding a needle in a haystack.
translation.zh: 找这个地址就像大海捞针

translation.en: Yeah, Edison's right. Let's just give up.
translation.zh: 爱迪生说得对 我们放弃吧

translation.en: -That is not what I said. -What? Dudes, look, we tried.
translation.zh: -我可没说放弃 -什么？伙计们 我们尝试过了

translation.en: One thing. We literally tried one thing.
translation.zh: 一次 我们只尝试了一次

translation.en: Yeah, and it didn't work.
translation.zh: 是的 结果没有用

translation.en: -[horn sounds] -We all got wet, Edison. God!
translation.zh: 我们都湿透了 爱迪生 天啊！

translation.en: Look, this isn't fun anymore.
translation.zh: 看 这已经一点意思都没有了

translation.en: Uh, I can fix that.
translation.zh: 我有办法

translation.en: Let's get hammered!
translation.zh: 我们嗨起来吧！

translation.en: Then, fuck it, we hit the streets mob-rules style.
translation.zh: 然后 去他妈的 我们去占领街头

translation.en: Anyone we see who doesn't look like us, they see the bottom of our boots!
translation.zh: 但凡遇到和我们不一样的人 就让他们尝尝我们的拳打脚踢！

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天

translation.en: Okay, fine, no Indians this time. Ooh, geez.
translation.zh: 好吧 这次不算印第安人 天啊

translation.en: Oh, my God. I don't know how many times I have to tell you, Sam.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天 我不知道要跟你说多少次 山姆

translation.en: -This is not India. -Also, you're a fucking racist.
translation.zh: -这里不是印度 -还有 你他妈种族主义

translation.en: Uh, no, Paul's the racist.
translation.zh: 不 保罗才是种族主义

translation.en: He's the best horse racist in the colonies.
translation.zh: 他是殖民地最厉害的马族主义者

translation.en: Yeah, I'm a great racist.
translation.zh: 没错 我是个杰出的种族主义者

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 苍天啊

translation.en: Who wants pizza rolls and purple stuff?
translation.zh: 谁想要披萨卷和紫色的东西？

translation.en: -Oh, wow, Chief Geronimo! -Just Geronimo is fine.
translation.zh: -哇 杰罗尼莫酋长！ -叫我杰罗尼莫就好

translation.en: -You're the famous renegade tracker. -Sure.
translation.zh: -你是有名的叛徒追踪者 -没错

translation.en: And [gasps] you're Thomas Edison, the world-renowned scientist!
translation.zh: 你是托马斯爱迪生 世界闻名的科学家！

translation.en: [scoffs] The same.
translation.zh: 幸会

translation.en: Wow, George, the team is really shaping up nicely.
translation.zh: 乔治 团队发展得真不错

translation.en: Oh, no. No, we're not a team anymore, Martha. We quit.
translation.zh: 哦 不 我们已经不是一个团队了 玛莎 我们解散了

translation.en: -What? -Besides, the revolution was Abe's thing.
translation.zh: -什么？ -另外 革命是亚伯喜欢的事情

translation.en: I tried to avenge him, but we blew it.
translation.zh: 我试过为他复仇 但我们搞砸了

translation.en: Now, we're just gonna jam a bit and slam some beers.
translation.zh: 现在 我们准备玩会儿音乐 然后猛灌啤酒

translation.en: This is a basic blues riff, guys.
translation.zh: 这个基础蓝调乐段 各位

translation.en: Just watch me for the changes. All right, losers, let's party.
translation.zh: 注意观察我的变化 好了 失败者们 来开派对吧

translation.en: No! George Bon Jovi Washington, you do not get to party.
translation.zh: 不！乔治邦乔飞华盛顿 你不能开派对

translation.en: -What? -Would Abe want to party right now?
translation.zh: -什么？ -现在亚伯会想开派对吗？

translation.en: Abe never wanted to party.
translation.zh: 亚伯从来都不想开派对

translation.en: Because he had goals, unrealized dreams.
translation.zh: 因为他有目标 有未实现的梦想

translation.en: But you bet your ass once those dreams were realized,
translation.zh: 但我敢肯定 一旦梦想实现了

translation.en: he would've snorted a line as long as the Magna Carta.
translation.zh: 他会猛吸大宪章那么长的可卡因

translation.en: Really? No. Abe? My Abe?
translation.zh: 真的吗？不 亚伯？我的亚伯？

translation.en: Are you kidding? With that head?
translation.zh: 你开什么玩笑？长那种脑袋的人？

translation.en: [laughs] Dude was all sinus. He was made for the marching powder.
translation.zh: 那家伙鼻窦那么大 天生就适合吸可卡因

translation.en: Not how cocaine works.
translation.zh: 可卡因不是这么用的

translation.en: Now, those goals are your goals.
translation.zh: 现在 那些目标成了你的目标

translation.en: Those unrealized dreams are your unrealized dreams.
translation.zh: 那些未实现的梦想 就是你未实现的梦想

translation.en: That's the promise that you made, right?
translation.zh: 你许下过这样的誓言 对吗？

translation.en: So, achieve those goals.
translation.zh: 那就去达成那些目标

translation.en: Realize those dreams.
translation.zh: 实现那些梦想

translation.en: And then, you can party like a rich white man
translation.zh: 然后你就能像一个 有钱白人那样开派对了

translation.en: who will never face adversity for the rest of his glorious life!
translation.zh: 他的光辉余生永远不会再遇到逆境！

translation.en: You're right. I have to earn it.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我要去争取

translation.en: That is what Abe would want,
translation.zh: 这是亚伯想要的

translation.en: that insane coke-hound! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那个可卡因疯子！

translation.en: Guys, I've thought about it.
translation.zh: 各位 我想好了

translation.en: I'm willing to give it another shot if you are.
translation.zh: 如果你们愿意 我想再试一次

translation.en: -What do you say? -Sure, man.
translation.zh: -你们怎么想？ -好 伙计

translation.en: Um, you're the one who quit.
translation.zh: 是你要解散的

translation.en: If we can find Arnold, we can force the Gettysburg Address out of him.
translation.zh: 如果我们能找到阿诺德 就能逼他交待葛底斯堡演说的位置

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, did none of you notice my fucking arm?
translation.zh: 抱歉 没人注意到我的胳膊吗？

translation.en: Benedict Arnold is a werewolf!
translation.zh: 本尼迪克特阿诺德是个狼人！

translation.en: In some cultures, known as a skinwalker.
translation.zh: 在某些文化中又叫作皮行者

translation.en: He ain't givin' up shit unless he thinks we're an actual threat to him.
translation.zh: 他什么都不会说的 除非他觉得我们真的构成了威胁

translation.en: The only way to be an actual threat to him--
translation.zh: 能威胁到他的唯一方法…

translation.en: Is if we have a silver bullet.
translation.zh: 就是拥有银子弹

translation.en: -Exactly. -Wait, what are we doing again?
translation.zh: -没错 -等等 我们要干什么来着？

translation.en: A silver bullet? Who could ever even make such a thing?
translation.zh: 银子弹？有谁能做这种东西？

translation.en: I know a blacksmith.
translation.zh: 我认识一个铁匠

translation.en: He made this armor and I've never taken it off.
translation.zh: 这副铠甲是他做的 我从来没有脱下来过

translation.en: Okay. Okay! We'll visit this blacksmith
translation.zh: 好 我们去拜访这位铁匠

translation.en: and he will discover the secret of the impossible weapon we require.
translation.zh: 他会发现我们需要的 这件不可思议的武器的秘密

translation.en: Because our cause is just!
translation.zh: 因为我们的事业是正义的！

translation.en: It is righteous!
translation.zh: 是公正的！

translation.en: It is His will! His and Abe's!
translation.zh: 这是神的意志！神和亚伯的意志！

translation.en: -And the Earth Mother's. -Nope.
translation.zh: -还有地球母亲 -不

translation.en: -And Isaac Newton's. -Nope. Just God's.
translation.zh: -还有艾萨克牛顿 -不 只有上帝

translation.en: I hold these truths to be self-evident.
translation.zh: 我认为这些真理是不言而喻的

translation.en: All for one and one for all!
translation.zh: 人人为我 我为人人！

translation.en: We will find the Gettysburg Address.
translation.zh: 我们会找到葛底斯堡演说的位置的

translation.en: [all] Huzzah!
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: [Paul] Huzzah! Nope, too late.
translation.zh: 好耶！不 太晚了

translation.en: -Smittay! -[bell chimes]
translation.zh: 阿铁！

translation.en: Damn! Fuck my life.
translation.zh: 该死！真糟心

translation.en: We're friends.
translation.zh: 我们是朋友

translation.en: Do I even wanna know why you need a silver bullet?
translation.zh: 我是不是应该问 你们为什么需要银子弹？

translation.en: Best that you not know, Mr. Smith.
translation.zh: 还是不知道为好 匠先生

translation.en: Why do you keep calling me Mr. Smith?
translation.zh: 为什么老是叫我匠先生？

translation.en: Well, Revere called you Black Smith.
translation.zh: 这个 因为列维尔叫你黑铁匠

translation.en: -Right, because I'm a blacksmith. -Right. A Black Smith.
translation.zh: -对 因为我是个铁匠 -对 黑铁匠

translation.en: -A blacksmith. -Black Smith.
translation.zh: -一个铁匠 -黑铁匠

translation.en: I'm a smith who works with metal,
translation.zh: 我是个锻造金属的匠人

translation.en: which oxidizes during the heating process and turns black.
translation.zh: 这种金属在加热过程中会氧化变黑

translation.en: -So, you're a Smith. -Exactly.
translation.zh: -所以你是个匠人 -没错

translation.en: -Of the Baltimore Smiths? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 来自巴尔的摩的匠氏家族？

translation.en: Just tell me what you need it for.
translation.zh: 你们只管告诉我要用它干什么

translation.en: It'll be used to free the colonies. Let's just leave it at that.
translation.zh: 用来解放殖民地 就这么说吧

translation.en: Oh, you're talking about the Brits.
translation.zh: 你是说对付英国人

translation.en: Shit, why didn't you say so? I'm definitely down for that.
translation.zh: 我去 干嘛不早说？我肯定愿意啊

translation.en: -You are? -Fuck, yeah!
translation.zh: -是吗？ -当然！

translation.en: I mean, don't get it twisted.
translation.zh: 别误会了

translation.en: I definitely do not trust you motherfuckers.
translation.zh: 我肯定不相信你们这些混蛋

translation.en: You three, especially.
translation.zh: 特别是你们三个

translation.en: But fuck, man, I hate the British.
translation.zh: 但是去他妈的 我讨厌英国人

translation.en: Why, what have the fun police done to you?
translation.zh: 为什么？扫兴军团对你做了什么？

translation.en: Look around. I'm a small business owner.
translation.zh: 看看吧 我是个小生意人

translation.en: What's a small business owner's greatest enemy?
translation.zh: 小生意人最大的敌人是谁？

translation.en: -Large businesses? -Thin profit margins?
translation.zh: -大型企业？ -微薄的利润？

translation.en: -Rising lube costs? -White people stealing everything you own.
translation.zh: -润滑油日益昂贵？ -被白人偷走你拥有的一切

translation.en: -Having a squirrel for a friend? -No.
translation.zh: -和松鼠做朋友？ -不

translation.en: -Staff turnover? -Tesla being a bitch?
translation.zh: -员工流动率？ -特斯拉胡搅蛮缠？

translation.en: -Not getting drunk at lunch? -White people stealing everything you own.
translation.zh: -午饭不能喝醉？ -被白人偷走你拥有的一切

translation.en: Constant instinct to second-guess
translation.zh: 用积蓄盲目投资后

translation.en: having risked your savings on unproven business acumen?
translation.zh: 不停放马后炮？

translation.en: -No, it's taxes. -Taxes. Correct.
translation.zh: -不 是税负 -税负 正确

translation.en: Small business taxes. And what's the big knock against the British?
translation.zh: 小生意的税负 对英国人最大的诟病是什么？

translation.en: -Something about taxation! -Exactly.
translation.zh: -和税有关！ -没错

translation.en: You'll help us? You'll craft the silver bullet free of charge?
translation.zh: 你会帮我们吗？ 你会免费制造银子弹吗？

translation.en: What? Are you white motherfuckers crazy?
translation.zh: 什么？你们这些白人混蛋疯了吗？

translation.en: I just told you I'm a small business owner.
translation.zh: 我刚说了 我是个小生意人

translation.en: You think I'm gonna give you silver for free?
translation.zh: 你们觉得我会免费把银子给你们？

translation.en: Well, we don't have silver.
translation.zh: 我们没有银子

translation.en: The British seized it all when they got here--
translation.zh: 英国人刚来的时候全拿走了…

translation.en: Spoons. Teaspoons. I remember.
translation.zh: 汤匙、茶匙 我记得

translation.en: Why do you think that shit's so expensive?
translation.zh: 你们以为这玩意儿为什么这么贵？

translation.en: Okay. Well, how much do we need for, like, one bullet?
translation.zh: 好吧 那一颗子弹需要多少银？

translation.en: -A metric shit-ton. -For one bullet?
translation.zh: -一公吨 -只造一颗子弹要这么多？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Are you a fucking metallurgist like me?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你跟我一样是个冶金师吗？

translation.en: -That's, like, a thousand spoons! -Three thousand.
translation.zh: -那得要一千把汤匙！ -三千

translation.en: It's a metric shit-ton.
translation.zh: 是公制的一吨

translation.en: Where are we gonna get 3,000 spoons overnight, bro?
translation.zh: 我们一夜之间上哪去找 三千把汤匙 老兄？

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 这个嘛…

translation.en: [blacksmith] May I present, the year's biggest tea party.
translation.zh: 请容我介绍 今年最盛大的茶宴

translation.en: You need silver spoons, you need to get aboard that ship.
translation.zh: 需要银质汤匙 就上那艘船

translation.en: Wait a minute. How did you know about this?
translation.zh: 等一下 你怎么知道这件事？

translation.en: [Samuel] What's up with these assholes and flyers?
translation.zh: 这些传单是怎么回事？ （仅限一晚 免费银质汤匙）

translation.en: Well, it's a great way to communicate with a widespread audience,
translation.zh: 这是一种和大量受众沟通的良好方式

translation.en: much like direct mail or the Pony Express, where my brother does not work.
translation.zh: 就像直邮信件和快马速送 我的兄弟不在那里上班

translation.en: -[grunts] All right. Shall we? -Wait, wait, wait. Wait!
translation.zh: -好了 我们走吧？ -等等

translation.en: -We need a plan. -Why?
translation.zh: -我们需要计划 -为什么？

translation.en: Well, last time we didn't have one and things got shitty.
translation.zh: 上次我们没做计划 事情变得很糟

translation.en: -Huh? -Yeah, Geronimo lost his arm.
translation.zh: 是的 杰罗尼莫失去了手臂

translation.en: -No, he lost like three-fifths of an arm. -[scoffs] Seriously?
translation.zh: -不 他失去了五分之三的手臂 -你认真的吗？

translation.en: Oh, thoughts and prayers.
translation.zh: 深表哀悼 为你祈祷

translation.en: Look, good leaders like Abe have a plan for everything.
translation.zh: 像亚伯这样优秀的领导人 凡事皆有计划

translation.en: -All right, His Leadership, let's hear it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好吧 领导大人 愿闻其详 -好

translation.en: So, Mr. Smith, you'll be the lookout.
translation.zh: 匠先生 你来放哨

translation.en: -[blacksmith laughs] Nope. -What?
translation.zh: -不要 -什么？

translation.en: You want me, a Black dude, to sit here in the dark, alone,
translation.zh: 你想让我这个黑色的家伙 独自坐在黑暗中

translation.en: to play lookout for you while you break the law?
translation.zh: 在你们犯法的时候为你们放哨？

translation.en: Oh, hell no! I hate the British but I ain't lookin' to get killed.
translation.zh: 才不要 我恨英国人 但我可不想找死

translation.en: So, y'all are on your own to get that silver.
translation.zh: 你们自己去搞银子吧

translation.en: But if you do get it, I'll make your little bullet.
translation.zh: 不过如果你们能弄到手 我就帮你们做小子弹

translation.en: All right. Then… here's the plan.
translation.zh: 好吧 那…计划是这样的

translation.en: Geronimo, you'll be the lookout. Are you cool with being the lookout?
translation.zh: 杰罗尼莫 你来放哨 你愿意吗？

translation.en: I mean, if my choice is to be the lookout
translation.zh: 如果让我选 自己放哨

translation.en: or have one of you looking out for me, yeah, I'll be the lookout.
translation.zh: 还是让你们帮我放哨 那我选自己放哨

translation.en: Great. Okay. Edison, you'll pose as the wife of an officer already on board.
translation.zh: 很好 那爱迪生 你来扮演 一位已经登船的官员的妻子

translation.en: [groans] This is taking too long. Let's just dress as those guys.
translation.zh: 这太花时间了 我们乔装成那些家伙就行

translation.en: [all] Ello, guv.
translation.zh: 你好 长官

translation.en: Well, technically, that is a plan.
translation.zh: 从技术上来说 这是个计划

translation.en: Just technically, a very bad plan.
translation.zh: 但技术上来说 是个糟糕的计划

translation.en: Ha! I told you a jail would be a better use of space than lifeboats.
translation.zh: 我说的吧 这地方做监狱 比放救生艇管用

translation.en: Hey, at least we got on board, right, guys?
translation.zh: 嘿 至少我们上船了 对吗？各位

translation.en: I consider this mission accomplished. Ooh, we should get a banner.
translation.zh: 我认为这个任务完成了 我们应该收获一枚旗帜

translation.en: Ugh, shockingly, Sam's not wrong. We can still make this work.
translation.zh: 令人惊讶的是 山姆说的没错 我们还是可以成功的

translation.en: I've taken note of how often the guards go on rounds.
translation.zh: 我记下了守卫换班的周期

translation.en: -If we lay low for a few hours-- -No!
translation.zh: -如果我们保持低调几个小时… -不！

translation.en: Enough with all of the planning!
translation.zh: 不要再做计划了！

translation.en: Did Magellan have a plan when he circumnavigated the globe?
translation.zh: 麦哲伦环游地球的时候做计划了吗？

translation.en: -[all] No! -[Edison] Yes.
translation.zh: -没有！ -做了

translation.en: That took a lot of preparation.
translation.zh: 其实花了很长时间准备

translation.en: We'll set our course for freedom using only our wits as our guide.
translation.zh: 我们的解放事业只需要由智慧来导航

translation.en: Mr. Revere, tear down that wall.
translation.zh: 列维尔先生 推倒那面墙

translation.en: What is this place?
translation.zh: 这是什么地方？

translation.en: I don't know, but don't touch any--
translation.zh: 不知道 但什么也别碰…

translation.en: Ooh, oops.
translation.zh: 哎呀

translation.en: They're steeping the colonists in tea!
translation.zh: 他们把殖民地居民泡在茶里！

translation.en: Turning them British. James, you sick bastard!
translation.zh: 把他们变成英国人 詹姆斯 你这个恶心的混蛋！

translation.en: Look, as far as I can tell, this is a test run.
translation.zh: 在我看来 这像是测试阶段

translation.en: James is up to something bigger than crushing the revolution.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯的计划比粉碎革命还要庞大

translation.en: Maybe even… Oh, fuck! I don't even want to say it!
translation.zh: 也许甚至是…该死 我都说不出口！

translation.en: -Just say it. -Something global.
translation.zh: -说吧 -某种全球性的计划

translation.en: -That means… -There are global stakes now.
translation.zh: -也就是说… -全球都有份

translation.en: Good God! Can you figure out what he's planning?
translation.zh: 老天爷啊 你能弄清楚 他的计划是什么吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I think I can. If I can just hack the mainframe.
translation.zh: 我觉得可以 如果我能黑进主机的话

translation.en: Great. Guys, gather as many silver spoons as you can.
translation.zh: 很好 各位 尽量多收集银质汤匙

translation.en: In the meantime, I'll get these hardworking Americans out of these tubes!
translation.zh: 与此同时 我要把这些 勤奋的美利坚人从试管里放出来

translation.en: [Edison] George! No!
translation.zh: 乔治！不要！

translation.en: No! I had almost downloaded the plan.
translation.zh: 不！我差一点就把计划下载下来了

translation.en: -Uh, guys, we gotta go. -Yep.
translation.zh: -各位 我们该走了 -对

translation.en: Totally right. Grab spoons, guys. Quick, let's go.
translation.zh: 没错 拿上汤匙 各位 我们赶快走

translation.en: -[Paul] Oh, no. -Oh, my God, the humanity.
translation.zh: -哦 不 -哦 我的天 这么多人

translation.en: This is bad. This is so bad.
translation.zh: 这很糟糕 太糟了

translation.en: Those poor boat people.
translation.zh: 船上那些可怜人

translation.en: Look, if anybody asks, the Titanic hit an iceberg.
translation.zh: 如果有人问起 就说泰坦尼克号撞上了冰山

translation.en: We were never here, baby.
translation.zh: 我们从未来过 亲爱的

translation.en: It's hopeless, Martha. At this rate, I'll never avenge Abe.
translation.zh: 真绝望 玛莎 照这个速度 我永远也无法为亚伯复仇

translation.en: And see his dream through, don't forget.
translation.zh: 别忘了 还有实现他的梦想

translation.en: -That's the whole second part. -I tried.
translation.zh: -那可是后一半使命 -我试过了

translation.en: I tried to be a leader like him, Martha. It's just not working.
translation.zh: 我试过成为一个像他一样的领袖 玛莎 但没有成功

translation.en: Oh, George. Abe was a great leader, but you can't copy him.
translation.zh: 乔治 亚伯是个伟大的领袖 但你不能照搬他

translation.en: You must find your own style of leadership.
translation.zh: 你要找到属于自己的领导风格

translation.en: Maybe something with less planning. Something more free-spirited, like you.
translation.zh: 也许不要有那么多计划 要多一些自由精神 就像你一样

translation.en: I know. I just wish I realized that before we…
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是希望能早点意识到…

translation.en: Before the Titanic hit that iceberg.
translation.zh: 不至于让泰坦尼克号撞上那座冰山

translation.en: Yes. What a tragedy.
translation.zh: 是啊 真是个悲剧

translation.en: Right? Such a tragedy!
translation.zh: 是吧？太悲剧了！

translation.en: It feels like, for every step forward, we just take two steps back. John 3:16.
translation.zh: 感觉就像每前进一步 就后退两步 约翰福音第3章第16节

translation.en: Then, let's focus on the positive, huh? What was tonight's step forward?
translation.zh: 那我们就来看积极的一面吧 今晚前进的一步是什么？

translation.en: -I got these spoons. -[spoons jingling]
translation.zh: 我拿到了这些汤匙

translation.en: Oh, that's great, George. And are they, like, for something?
translation.zh: 太棒了 乔治 它们有什么用途吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but they're still useless without the Gettysburg Address.
translation.zh: 有的 可找不到葛底斯堡演说的位置 它们就毫无用处

translation.en: [sighs] The tirelessness with which you've pursued your quest
translation.zh: 你不知疲倦的求索

translation.en: has betrayed your confidence in it.
translation.zh: 让自己失去了信心

translation.en: Perhaps a quick HJ to help you sleep.
translation.zh: 也许一个快速手活能帮你入睡

translation.en: Generous, but I need to earn it.
translation.zh: 真慷慨 但我要靠自己争取

translation.en: Then, for now, rest, my love.
translation.zh: 那现在就好好休息吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Clear your head. It's always darkest before the dawn.
translation.zh: 放空思绪 黎明前总是最黑暗的

translation.en: -John 3:16? -I don't think so, champ.
translation.zh: -约翰福音第3章第16节？ -我觉得应该不是 宝贝

translation.en: For now, rest, my love. Clear your head.
translation.zh: 那现在就好好休息吧 亲爱的 放空思绪

translation.en: It's always darkest before the dawn.
translation.zh: 黎明前总是最黑暗的

translation.en: Where am I?
translation.zh: 我在哪？

translation.en: [Abe] Don't worry, George. You're safe.
translation.zh: 别担心 乔治 你很安全

translation.en: Abe? Abe, is that you? I can't see. Everything's so bright.
translation.zh: 亚伯？是你吗？ 我看不见 周围太亮了

translation.en: Oh, that's me. Sorry, I was trying to make this seem more impressive.
translation.zh: 是我 抱歉 我想让出场更震撼一些

translation.en: It's great to see you, Abe. But what is this place?
translation.zh: 见到你真好 亚伯 但这是什么地方？

translation.en: [echoing] It's your dream world, George.
translation.zh: 这是你的梦境 乔治

translation.en: Is it? Can I ask a question, real quick? Why is my dream world so shitty?
translation.zh: 是吗？我能问个小问题吗？ 我的梦境怎么这么破？

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, we ran out of money.
translation.zh: 我们经费用完了

translation.en: -My dream ran out of money? -Sure.
translation.zh: -我梦里的经费用完了？ -没错

translation.en: Yeah. Look, I've been told by the, you know, "dream producers,"
translation.zh: 对 是这样 梦境制作人告诉我

translation.en: that we could use this money more effectively elsewhere.
translation.zh: 这笔钱用在别处会更好

translation.en: Like in an epic ending battle happening sometime in the next 30 minutes or so.
translation.zh: 比如接下来大概30分钟后 发生的一场史诗级终极大战

translation.en: Okay, well, what were you gonna do?
translation.zh: 好吧 你本来打算怎么做？

translation.en: Oh, I had this whole idea worked out.
translation.zh: 我都想好了

translation.en: -You were gonna fight a dream-hydra. -Whoa, that's cool.
translation.zh: -你梦里要和一条九头蛇打斗 -真酷

translation.en: I know. And it was made up of all of King James' rules.
translation.zh: 是啊 它是由 詹姆斯国王的规定构成的

translation.en: And for every rule you cut down, another appeared.
translation.zh: 你每砍下一条规定 就又会出现另一条

translation.en: -Rah! -[George] Ooh!
translation.zh: （《不可能的梦》）

translation.en: -That's a nice metaphor, dude! -Thanks, bro.
translation.zh: -这个隐喻真棒 老兄 -谢谢你 兄弟

translation.en: And it was all about how the revolution
translation.zh: 它阐述的是

translation.en: is about more than just breaking the king's rules.
translation.zh: 革命不只是为了打破国王的规定

translation.en: It's also about your son.
translation.zh: 它还和你的儿子有关

translation.en: -What? I'm havin' a boy? -[laughs] Yeah!
translation.zh: -什么？我要有儿子了？ -是的！

translation.en: Boom! Sex, bitch! Oh, shit! Yeah!
translation.zh: 好耶！性爱万岁！太好了！耶！

translation.en: Either way would be cool. Girls are cool.
translation.zh: 哪个都挺好的 女孩也很好

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, it's a son, though. He's the future.
translation.zh: 对 不过是个男孩 他就是未来

translation.en: Him and all the sons and daughters of this great nation,
translation.zh: 他和这个伟大国家所有的子女

translation.en: no matter what they look like or where they come from.
translation.zh: 无论他们长相如何 来自哪里

translation.en: Be a leader for them, George.
translation.zh: 成为他们的领袖吧 乔治

translation.en: A leader for all people!
translation.zh: 所有人民的领袖！

translation.en: I get it. I get it, Abe.
translation.zh: 我明白了 亚伯

translation.en: But I would've got it a lot better
translation.zh: 但如果能让我在梦里

translation.en: if I was kicking an ass of a giant dream-hydra,
translation.zh: 打爆巨型九头蛇 我会更开心

translation.en: but I'm just saying, I get it. I got it.
translation.zh: 但我就说说而已 我懂的

translation.en: Agreed. But don't worry, George.
translation.zh: 同意 但是别担心 乔治

translation.en: There's plenty of fighting left to do. Oh, and one more thing.
translation.zh: 还有很多打斗戏 还有一件事

translation.en: What is it, old chum? You can tell me anything.
translation.zh: 怎么了？老朋友 你想说什么都可以

translation.en: When your wife offers you a hand job, you take it.
translation.zh: 如果你老婆要给你手淫 不要拒绝

translation.en: -[Martha] George! -Martha!
translation.zh: -乔治！ -玛莎！

translation.en: -[groans] George! -Martha!
translation.zh: -乔治！ -玛莎！

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about her, Georgie.
translation.zh: 别为她担心 小乔治

translation.en: She'll be quite not well taken care of, if you catch my drift.
translation.zh: 如果你明白我的意思 她可不会被好好招待

translation.en: I don't. But you were on the Titanic. You should be dead.
translation.zh: 我不明白 但你之前在泰坦尼克号上 你应该已经死了

translation.en: I mean, I heard you were on the Titanic.
translation.zh: 我是说 我听说你在泰坦尼克号上

translation.en: That's what I heard from someone who was there,
translation.zh: 我从在场的人那里听说的

translation.en: while I was here… reading… this book.
translation.zh: 当时我在这里…读…这本书

translation.en: The Graps of Wreath.
translation.zh: 《愤葡的怒萄》

translation.en: Yes, well, I'm an excellent swimmer, dickhead.
translation.zh: 是的 但我是个游泳健将 傻子

translation.en: You should've done your research.
translation.zh: 你应该好好调查一下的

translation.en: Thanks for the tip.
translation.zh: 多谢指点

translation.en: When Edison invents the Internet next year,
translation.zh: 等明年爱迪生发明了互联网

translation.en: I'll make sure to edit your Wikipedia page myself.
translation.zh: 我会亲自写你的维基百科页面

translation.en: "Benedict Arnold, great swimmer and a total fucking asswipe."
translation.zh: “本尼迪克特阿诺德 游泳健将 彻头彻尾的贱人”

translation.en: Well, I'll just change it back.
translation.zh: 我会改回来的
