translation.en: No, you won't, because you'll be dead!
translation.zh: 不 你不会 因为那时候你已经死了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Well, maybe after she invents the Internet,
translation.zh: 你朋友爱迪生发明互联网之后

translation.en: your friend Edison can invent chainsaws that don't require gasoline. [laughs]
translation.zh: 最好还发明出不用汽油的链锯

translation.en: You sucked the gas out of my arm chainsaws while I was sleeping?
translation.zh: 你趁我睡着 把我手臂链锯里的汽油吸出来了？

translation.en: Jesus Christ, what kind of psychopath are you?
translation.zh: 老天爷 你怎么这么变态？

translation.en: The worst kind.
translation.zh: 最恶心的变态

translation.en: Whatever you take that to mean. Take her to the Gettysburg Address.
translation.zh: 随你怎么理解都行 带她去葛底斯堡演说的位置

translation.en: -[Martha] George, no! -Martha!
translation.zh: -乔治 不！ -玛莎！

translation.en: Oh, my, Georgie, I just realized we woke you up.
translation.zh: 哦 天啊 小乔治 我刚意识到我们把你吵醒了

translation.en: -Please allow us to recompense. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 请让我们补偿你一下

translation.en: [Paul] Last night was bad news, human friends.
translation.zh: 昨晚有坏消息 人类朋友们 （独立商场）

translation.en: Yeah, bad news for the fun police. Eat a dick, Titanic!
translation.zh: 是的 对扫兴军团来说是坏消息 吃屎吧 泰坦尼克号！

translation.en: -[laughs] -Right! Yes! Cool, cool, cool.
translation.zh: 没错 是的 很酷

translation.en: And I guess the entire harbor ecosystem can just eat a dick, too, right?
translation.zh: 我猜整个港口的生态系统 也都可以吃屎去了 对吧？

translation.en: I mean… Yes, 100%.
translation.zh: 我是说…没错 千真万确

translation.en: Alarm! Alarm! Alarm! Alarm! Alarm!
translation.zh: 警报！

translation.en: -Are you okay? -George! What is it?
translation.zh: -你没事吧？ -乔治！怎么了？

translation.en: Arnold kidnapped Martha!
translation.zh: 阿诺德绑架了玛莎！

translation.en: -Oh, no! -It sucks when they steal your wife!
translation.zh: -哦 不！ -被人偷走老婆总是很糟糕！

translation.en: And she's pregnant!
translation.zh: 她还有孕在身！

translation.en: -What? -Congratulations, that's a beautiful gift!
translation.zh: -什么？ -恭喜 真是天赐礼物！

translation.en: Thanks! I'm sorry this is how I'm telling you,
translation.zh: 谢谢！抱歉用这种方式告诉你们

translation.en: but we appreciate your support!
translation.zh: 但我们感谢你们的支持！

translation.en: We're already on waiting lists for preschool.
translation.zh: 我们已经在排队报名学前班了

translation.en: Hey, man. Maybe you need to take some time for yourself.
translation.zh: 嘿 伙计 也许你需要缓一缓

translation.en: It's a lot, emotionally. I would know.
translation.zh: 这种事对人情绪冲击很大 我也懂

translation.en: No, that's exactly what I don't need.
translation.zh: 不 我需要的不是缓一缓

translation.en: The old George would just party these woes away.
translation.zh: 过去的乔治会开派对来排解心情

translation.en: But not me. This just adds fuel to my fuckin' fire.
translation.zh: 但我不会 这反而更激起了我的斗志

translation.en: Hell yeah, man!
translation.zh: 没错 伙计！

translation.en: Ben said he's keeping her at the Gettysburg Address.
translation.zh: 本说他会把她关在 葛底斯堡演说的位置

translation.en: Which we still don't have. George, I'm sorry to say,
translation.zh: 我们还不知道在哪 乔治 很抱歉

translation.en: but we've tried everything to crack this code.
translation.zh: 我们试了所有破解密码的方法

translation.en: -Code… -I don't know what else we can do.
translation.zh: -密码… -我不知道我们还有什么别的办法

translation.en: -Code… Oh! Holy shit! -What?
translation.zh: -密码…天啊！ -怎么了？

translation.en: [George] Not many people know this,
translation.zh: 没有多少人知道

translation.en: but Abe wasn't just America's premier celebrity chef.
translation.zh: 亚伯不仅是美利坚的超级名人厨师 （关门）

translation.en: He was also its most capable cryptographer.
translation.zh: 还是最棒的密码破译员

translation.en: Plip-plopipher?
translation.zh: 迷妹破医院？

translation.en: Cryptographer. You know, someone who crafts and solves codes and ciphers.
translation.zh: 是密码破译员 制作和破解密码和暗号的人

translation.en: [chuckling] Yeah, a plip-plopipher.
translation.zh: 对啊 迷妹破医院

translation.en: That's what I said. We're saying the same thing.
translation.zh: 我就是这么说的 我们说的是一样的

translation.en: Exactly. Which means that Abe's final edict,
translation.zh: 没错 也就是说 亚伯最后的指令

translation.en: that I name our freed country America, was itself likely a cipher.
translation.zh: 也就是让我把我们的自由国家 命名为美利坚 本身就可能是个暗号

translation.en: Hidden within the words of America, my friends,
translation.zh: 朋友们 藏在美利坚这个单词里的

translation.en: is the Gettysburg Address.
translation.zh: 就是葛底斯堡演说的位置

translation.en: I don't know, seems like kind of a leap.
translation.zh: 我不确定 感觉不太靠谱

translation.en: But I'll need some time to crack the code.
translation.zh: 但我需要一点时间破解密码

translation.en: In the meantime, someone must run the spoons to Black Smith.
translation.zh: 与此同时 要有人送汤匙去给黑铁匠

translation.en: [all at once] Not it!
translation.zh: 不是我！

translation.en: -All right, Chief, that's you. -What the fuck just happened?
translation.zh: -好了 酋长 就是你了 -刚刚发生了什么？

translation.en: Did I just lose a game that white people didn't explain the rules to?
translation.zh: 我刚刚是不是输掉了一场 白人没有解释规则的游戏？

translation.en: I can't carry all the silver.
translation.zh: 这么多银子我背不动

translation.en: -I only got the one arm. -[laughing] And whose fault is that?
translation.zh: -我只有一只手 -这要怪谁呢？

translation.en: That would be yours. For screwing up Vietnam.
translation.zh: 怪你 在越南搞砸了

translation.en: What are you talking about? We won Vietnam.
translation.zh: 说什么呢？我们在越南赢了

translation.en: [sighs] Actually, if it gives me some time away from you, yeah, I'll do it.
translation.zh: 说实话 如果这样 能让我远离你一会儿 那我愿意去

translation.en: -You are a good man, Chief Geronimo. -[Geronimo] Just Geronimo.
translation.zh: -你是个好人 杰罗尼莫酋长 -叫我杰罗尼莫

translation.en: The rest of you, come with me.
translation.zh: 其他人跟我来

translation.en: I know the perfect place to work on Abe's cipher.
translation.zh: 我知道一个 研究亚伯的暗号的绝佳场所

translation.en: Ugh, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: [King James] You left Washington alive.
translation.zh: 你没杀华盛顿

translation.en: [Benedict] Uh, yes, a calculated risk, my liege.
translation.zh: 是的 这是我算计好的风险 陛下

translation.en: Instead of trimming one thorn,
translation.zh: 不去剪除一丛荆棘

translation.en: we may soon be in position to wipe out the whole damn bush.
translation.zh: 可能更有利于我们扫平整片灌木丛

translation.en: [King James] And kidnapping his wife?
translation.zh: 那绑架她的妻子呢？

translation.en: You're not worried that will motivate him?
translation.zh: 你不担心这会激起他的斗志吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'm counting on it.
translation.zh: 要的就是这个效果

translation.en: Still, we should expedite my… Your plan.
translation.zh: 不过 我们仍应加快我的…您的计划

translation.en: Very well. Send me the head engineer.
translation.zh: 很好 让首席工程师来见我

translation.en: You wanted to see me, Your Majesty?
translation.zh: 您想见我 陛下？

translation.en: There's been a slight change of plan.
translation.zh: 计划稍稍有变

translation.en: We'll need my weapon operational sooner than anticipated.
translation.zh: 我们需要让我的武器更快投入使用

translation.en: How much sooner, Your Majesty?
translation.zh: 需要多快 陛下？

translation.en: You tell me.
translation.zh: 你来告诉我

translation.en: If we work around the clock,
translation.zh: 如果我们日夜不停

translation.en: we could probably have it ready in three weeks?
translation.zh: 或许可以在三周内准备好？

translation.en: Please, Your Majesty, Your Highness. I can do it faster.
translation.zh: 求您了 陛下 殿下 我可以更快

translation.en: Ah, thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地

translation.en: My foot!
translation.zh: 我的脚！

translation.en: Most impressive.
translation.zh: 多么震撼

translation.en: Manchester, come to Daddy.
translation.zh: 曼彻斯特 到爸爸这来

translation.en: Oh, look at the good boy.
translation.zh: 真是乖孩子

translation.en: Oh, look, you have a little engineer on your face.
translation.zh: 看啊 你脸上沾了一点工程师

translation.en: Well, I guess I do, too, now.
translation.zh: 我猜现在我脸上也有

translation.en: Don't I? Don't I? Yes!
translation.zh: 是不是？真好！

translation.en: I'll have Engineering redouble their efforts.
translation.zh: 好的 我要让工程部再加倍努力

translation.en: See that you do, Arnold.
translation.zh: 就这么干 阿诺德

translation.en: Whether or not you succeed with your plan,
translation.zh: 无论你的计划成功与否

translation.en: and in case it wasn't clear, I'm not holding my breath,
translation.zh: 而且说得明白点 我也没指望你会成功

translation.en: Washington is now marching inexorably
translation.zh: 华盛顿正义无反顾地冲向

translation.en: into the gnashing maw of the most diabolical war machine
translation.zh: 世界上最可怕的战争机器

translation.en: the world has ever known.
translation.zh: 那长嘴獠牙

translation.en: And he doesn't even see it coming.
translation.zh: 他自己却一无所知

translation.en: -[laughs maniacally] -Yes. They never do.
translation.zh: 是的 他们永远不会知道

translation.en: Uh, George? I thought you said you had a safe place to work.
translation.zh: 乔治 你不是说 有一个安全的地方可以做研究吗？

translation.en: -What? This looks good to me. -Thank you, Paul.
translation.zh: -什么？我觉得这里很好 -谢谢你 保罗

translation.en: But this isn't the place I had in mind. That is.
translation.zh: 但这不是我说的地方 那里才是

translation.en: -[all exclaim] -[Paul] It got even better!
translation.zh: 这就更棒了！

translation.en: [George] Abe, I'm home.
translation.zh: 亚伯 我回来了

translation.en: -[hisses] -[exclaims] Pardon me, ma'am.
translation.zh: 抱歉 女士

translation.en: Oh, my gord, horse toys! Whee!
translation.zh: 我的妈呀 小木马！

translation.en: George?
translation.zh: 乔治？

translation.en: -George, are you okay, buddy? -[sniffles]
translation.zh: 乔治 你没事吧 伙计？

translation.en: Yes, I am.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: But I need to be one with Abe now.
translation.zh: 但我现在要独自和亚伯在一起

translation.en: I have to get inside of his head if I hope to crack this code.
translation.zh: 要想破解密码 我就得进入他的头脑

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 来啊！

translation.en: Confirm! Please confirm!
translation.zh: 确认！请确认！

translation.en: We are cruisin'!
translation.zh: 开工啦！

translation.en: Oh, yeah! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: Next and next. Next. Too easy.
translation.zh: 下一个 太简单了

translation.en: No, no, don't. No, no. Yes! Reset 30%, please!
translation.zh: 不 别 不 对！重置30% 拜托

translation.en: Fuck no! I'm fucked.
translation.zh: 不要！我完了

translation.en: No, fuck!
translation.zh: 不 该死

translation.en: I am rusty, rusty.
translation.zh: 我生疏了

translation.en: Okay, at the hands of this guy is you.
translation.zh: 好 只能靠你了

translation.en: Eternal destruction.
translation.zh: 永恒毁灭

translation.en: Quick, quick, quick! Thank you.
translation.zh: 快！谢谢

translation.en: Return. Return. Yes!
translation.zh: 回车 好！

translation.en: Three, two, one. Go!
translation.zh: 三、二、一 来吧！

translation.en: Come on. Yeah!
translation.zh: 快 好！

translation.en: Whoo! Yeah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: You've been hacked, bro!
translation.zh: 你被黑了 老兄！

translation.en: So, what are you going to do when this is all over, huh?
translation.zh: 这一切结束之后 你有什么打算？

translation.en: You got family somewhere?
translation.zh: 你在什么地方有家人吗？

translation.en: Clyde is my family.
translation.zh: 克莱德就是我的家人

translation.en: No, I know, but like, you know, people family, friends?
translation.zh: 不 我知道 但你有没有人类家人和朋友？

translation.en: That's why I'm doing this.
translation.zh: 所以我才干这个

translation.en: You started a war against the most powerful country on Earth to make friends?
translation.zh: 你与地球上最强大的国家开战 就是为了交朋友？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I did. I never had people friends.
translation.zh: 是的 我以前没有人类朋友

translation.en: Oh, Paul. You have one now.
translation.zh: 保罗 你现在有一个了

translation.en: Thank you. Why do you wanna make war?
translation.zh: 谢谢你 你为什么想打仗？

translation.en: They're mean to you and they disrespect you, like a mule.
translation.zh: 他们对你很刻薄 也不尊重你 像对待骡子一样

translation.en: Well, George means well.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 乔治还算友善

translation.en: Sam disrespects me, but he's an idiot.
translation.zh: 山姆不尊重我 但他是个傻子

translation.en: Listen, lions don't concern themselves with the opinions of sheep.
translation.zh: 听着 狮子不关心绵羊的想法

translation.en: Well, I'm friends with a lot of sheep and, boy, are they opinionated.
translation.zh: 我有很多绵羊朋友 天啊 它们可有想法了

translation.en: -Oh, I just meant-- -[mimics sheep bleating]
translation.zh: 我的意思其实是…

translation.en: That's how sheep talk.
translation.zh: 绵羊就是这么说话的

translation.en: Look, I'm doing this because I want science for everyone.
translation.zh: 我这么做是为了 让每个人都能接触到科学

translation.en: Without fear of punishment or persecution or even judgment.
translation.zh: 不用担心受到惩罚、迫害乃至评判

translation.en: Problem is, the rich white assholes that run the joint
translation.zh: 问题是 管事的富有白人混蛋们

translation.en: keep telling everyone that science isn't real.
translation.zh: 一直跟人们说 科学不是真的

translation.en: So, I'm gonna show 'em.
translation.zh: 所以我要给他们看看

translation.en: I'm gonna show the whole damn world that science is real.
translation.zh: 我要让整个世界看到 科学是真的

translation.en: How are you gonna do that?
translation.zh: 你要怎么做？

translation.en: By using it to do something that no one can ignore.
translation.zh: 我要用它做出 任何人都无法忽视的事情

translation.en: -I'm going to use science to win a war. -Oh!
translation.zh: 我要用科学赢得一场战争

translation.en: I don't know how I'm gonna do it yet.
translation.zh: 我还不知道该怎么做

translation.en: But all it takes is one great invention deployed at the perfect time,
translation.zh: 但只需要在完美的时机 用上一个伟大的发明

translation.en: and then, the whole world will yell at once--
translation.zh: 然后全世界会齐声高呼…

translation.en: -[door slams open] -Eur-goddamn-reka!
translation.zh: 尤他妈的里卡！

translation.en: …at which point, I was reminded of one of Abe's favorite exploits.
translation.zh: …在某一刻 我想起了 亚伯最爱的英勇事迹之一

translation.en: After a reverse hash, I backdoored the root password.
translation.zh: 在反向散列之后 我从后门获得了根口令

translation.en: A base checksum against the main data store
translation.zh: 主数据存储的一个基础校验和

translation.en: allowed me to retrieve the salted hash,
translation.zh: 让我找到了加盐散列

translation.en: and then, from there, I was gleaming the cube.
translation.zh: 然后 从这里开始 我就光荣惨败了

translation.en: George, this is amazing!
translation.zh: 乔治 这太棒了

translation.en: You haven't even heard the kicker.
translation.zh: 你还没听到最棒的部分

translation.en: When I extrapolated through a dual node minimum spanning tree,
translation.zh: 当我通过一个双节点最小生成树 进行推断时

translation.en: the cipher's definition revealed itself.
translation.zh: 暗号的含义自己浮现了出来

translation.en: "A" is the first letter of the alphabet,
translation.zh: 美利坚的第一个字母“A” 排在字母表第一个

translation.en: which means it is letter number one.
translation.zh: 也就是说他是字母一号

translation.en: Therefore, "A" equals one.
translation.zh: 因此“A”等于一

translation.en: -Yeah, I understand all of this. -Oh!
translation.zh: 是的 这里我都听懂了

translation.en: And if "A" equals one, then--
translation.zh: 如果“A”等于一 那… （利坚一号）

translation.en: -You've got to be kidding me! -Both of us.
translation.zh: -你在逗我！ -我们都很惊讶

translation.en: I am not. America equals "1 Merica."
translation.zh: 我没开玩笑 美利坚等于“利坚一号”

translation.en: Now, does that word "Merica" ring a bell to any of you?
translation.zh: 有人对“利坚”这个词有印象吗？

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I know! Fuck, I lost it.
translation.zh: 我知道！不好 我忘记了

translation.en: Ooh, no. Does it start with a one?
translation.zh: 等等 地址里有“一”吗？

translation.en: Maybe this will jog your memory.
translation.zh: 也许这会让你想起些什么

translation.en: This is ten times magnification.
translation.zh: 这是十倍放大镜

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天

translation.en: [George] Gentlemen, lady, I give you the Gettysburg Address.
translation.zh: （葛底斯堡 利坚街一号） 先生们 女士 这是葛底斯堡演说的位置

translation.en: Oh. I guess we… I guess we should've scouted the area, right, guys?
translation.zh: 我猜我们…我猜我们应该先侦查一下 这片区域 是不是 各位？

translation.en: But then we wouldn't have had George's awesome code-cracking scene, right?
translation.zh: 但那样我们就看不到 乔治精彩的破译密码戏了 对吗？

translation.en: Really? You thought that was awesome?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你觉得那很精彩？

translation.en: It wasn't, you know, too indulgent?
translation.zh: 不会觉得太任性了吗？

translation.en: No way, dude. Totally realistic.
translation.zh: 不 哥们 非常写实

translation.en: And entirely too short.
translation.zh: 而且太短了

translation.en: Guys, you have got to see this. Look.
translation.zh: 各位 你们得看看这个

translation.en: [Samuel] What do you see?
translation.zh: 你看到什么了？

translation.en: [George] Redcoats standing around a table.
translation.zh: 英军围站在一张桌子旁

translation.en: And there's only one reason grown men would stand around a table.
translation.zh: 成年人围在桌子旁只有一个理由

translation.en: -To jerk off. -To plot-- What?
translation.zh: -就是手淫 -就是策划阴谋…什么？

translation.en: -To plot. -Exactly. The meeting's already underway.
translation.zh: -就是策划阴谋 -没错 会议已经开始了

translation.en: Then we haven't a moment to lose.
translation.zh: 我们一刻也不能耽搁了

translation.en: George, wait. We don't have the silver bullet yet.
translation.zh: 乔治 等等 我们还没拿到银子弹

translation.en: -We need it to kill Arnold. -Damn it! That's right.
translation.zh: -有它我们才能杀阿诺德 -该死！没错

translation.en: Where the hell are those guys with our silver bullet?
translation.zh: 拿着我们银子弹的人在哪里？

translation.en: ...and then the big dumb one says, "We won Vietnam."
translation.zh: 然后那个大傻子说 “我们在越南赢了”

translation.en: Can you imagine being so used to winning at everything for your whole life,
translation.zh: 你能想象吗？当你赢惯了一辈子

translation.en: that even when you lose, your brain's just like,
translation.zh: 哪怕输了 你的大脑也会说

translation.en: "Yo, we must've won that shit, right?"
translation.zh: “哟 那次我们肯定也赢了 对吧？”

translation.en: That's the definition of privilege, right there.
translation.zh: 这就是特权的定义

translation.en: Oh, I've tried to tell them that so many times,
translation.zh: 我试着这样跟他们说了好多次

translation.en: but they don't even hear me.
translation.zh: 但他们就是不听我的

translation.en: You wanna get through to them,
translation.zh: 要想让他们明白

translation.en: you'd have to put your message in like, I don't know,
translation.zh: 就得把信息处理成 那什么

translation.en: the dumbest thing possible, like a cartoon or something.
translation.zh: 最傻的东西 比如卡通什么的

translation.en: Hey, so how much longer on this silver bullet?
translation.zh: 嘿 那银子弹还要花多久做好？

translation.en: -Man, that shit been done for hours. -What?
translation.zh: -伙计 这玩意早就做好了 -什么？

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 哦耶

translation.en: I can't wait any longer.
translation.zh: 我等不下去了

translation.en: I have to rescue my wife and unborn child.
translation.zh: 我要去救我的妻子和未出生的孩子

translation.en: If that baby-eating bastard is in there--
translation.zh: 如果那个吃小孩的混蛋在里面…

translation.en: Oh, my God! He threatened to eat your unborn baby?
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！他威胁过说 要吃你未出生的孩子？

translation.en: No, no, no. I mean, not literally. But, look, he's very evil, Edison.
translation.zh: 不 不是字面意思 我只是形容他很邪恶 爱迪生

translation.en: I mean, come on. Are we splittin' hairs here?
translation.zh: 拜托 我们要在这纠结这种细节吗？

translation.en: George, without that silver bullet, we'll all be dinner.
translation.zh: 乔治 没有银子弹 我们都会被吃掉

translation.en: I know, okay? Look, guys, I don't expect you to go in there.
translation.zh: 我知道 好吧 各位 我没指望你们都进去

translation.en: It's suicide, but I have to.
translation.zh: 这是自杀 但我不得不去

translation.en: George, we're a team.
translation.zh: 乔治 我们是个团队

translation.en: If there's even a chance we can save your family,
translation.zh: 只要有一线希望能拯救你的家人

translation.en: we have to take it. Right, guys?
translation.zh: 我们都要冒这个险 对吗 各位？

translation.en: -Plus, I just heard he eats babies! -Oh, no!
translation.zh: -而且 我刚听说他会吃小孩！ -哦 不！

translation.en: -Sam, no! -I knew it!
translation.zh: -山姆 不是的！ -我早就知道！

translation.en: There's no time to lose. Come on. Let's get our sneak on.
translation.zh: 没时间了 快 我们悄悄潜入进去

translation.en: [softly] Science.
translation.zh: 科学

translation.en: Uh-huh. The door's not locked.
translation.zh: 门没锁

translation.en: It didn't need to be. Laser beams.
translation.zh: 没必要锁 有激光阵

translation.en: Hope you boys are limbered up.
translation.zh: 希望你们肢体够灵活

translation.en: Easy. Easy, does it. Easy, Daddy. Oh, easy.
translation.zh: 慢一点 好的 老兄 慢慢来

translation.en: Uh, guys, this is just yarn.
translation.zh: 各位 这只是纱线

translation.en: I'm creeping very quietly.
translation.zh: 我在悄悄行进

translation.en: Don't you move, bad guy!
translation.zh: 别动 坏人！

translation.en: Look at him go! That's great!
translation.zh: 看看他逃跑的样子 太棒了！

translation.en: Ha-ha! What the shit?
translation.zh: 什么鬼？

translation.en: Who fucking drew this? This is completely unrealistic.
translation.zh: 这谁画的？太假了 （华盛顿）

translation.en: -[man 1 over speaker] Pip-Pip, cheerio. -[man 2] Bob's your uncle.
translation.zh: -拜拜 再见 -好了 易如反掌

translation.en: -[man 1] Ello, guv! -[man 3] Bangers and mash.
translation.zh: -你好 长官！ -香肠和土豆泥

translation.en: That bastard set us up.
translation.zh: 那个混蛋耍了我们

translation.en: Martha!
translation.zh: 玛莎！

translation.en: -Martha! -George, wait! It's a… trap.
translation.zh: -玛莎！ -乔治 等等 是…陷阱

translation.en: Yep, shit.
translation.zh: 是 该死

translation.en: -What did they do to your wife? -Paul, that's not Martha.
translation.zh: -他们对你妻子做了什么？ -保罗 那不是玛莎

translation.en: It's a hyper-thermobaric bomb.
translation.zh: 那是超级温压弹

translation.en: My hand blasters should interrupt the current to the triggering mechanism.
translation.zh: 我的爆破手套应该能阻断 引爆装置的电流 科学

translation.en: [whispers] Science.
translation.zh: 引爆装置的电流 科学

translation.en: -[beeping] -Oh, what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Witch, that was your one chance
translation.zh: 女巫 那是你仅有的机会

translation.en: and your beloved science totally fucked us!
translation.zh: 你最爱的科学却完全搞砸了

translation.en: I don't understand. I used science.
translation.zh: 我不明白 我用了科学

translation.en: We're outta time. I have to get this as far away as possible.
translation.zh: 我们没时间了 我要把这玩意带到尽可能远的地方

translation.en: It's up to you guys now.
translation.zh: 要靠你们了

translation.en: Save Martha! Save America!
translation.zh: 拯救玛莎！拯救美利坚！

translation.en: No, you save her yourself, George.
translation.zh: 不 你自己去救她 乔治

translation.en: This is a job for a racist.
translation.zh: 这个工作就交给马族主义者吧

translation.en: The fastest racist in the colonies.
translation.zh: 殖民地最快的马族主义者

translation.en: Goodbye, people friends!
translation.zh: 再见 人类朋友们

translation.en: Go, Clyde! Fast as the wind!
translation.zh: 快跑 克莱德！飞奔起来！

translation.en: Hey, compadre, vamanos!
translation.zh: 嘿 老兄 走开！

translation.en: Clyde, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: 克莱德 你在说什么？

translation.en: Clyde can get a lot further away without Pablo's added weight.
translation.zh: 没有保布罗多余的重量 克莱德可以跑更远

translation.en: No! But Clyde is Paul's only friend!
translation.zh: 不！但克莱德是保罗唯一的朋友！

translation.en: -No, Pablo has human friends now. -But, Clyde--
translation.zh: -不 保布罗现在有人类朋友了 -可是 克莱德…

translation.en: Go! Git! [neighs]
translation.zh: 快走！驾！

translation.en: Don't you see?
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？

translation.en: -Clyde doesn't want Pablo around anymore. -What?
translation.zh: -克莱德不想再待在保布罗身边了 -什么？

translation.en: -Git! Damn it, Pablo, git! -Clyde, no!
translation.zh: -走啊！可恶 保布罗 快走！ -克莱德 不！

translation.en: -Get away! -Clyde, why would you say that? No!
translation.zh: -走开！ -克莱德 你为什么这么说？不！

translation.en: [crying] Clyde, please!
translation.zh: 克莱德 求求你！

translation.en: Clyde!
translation.zh: 克莱德！

translation.en: Oh, I guess that big idiot really cared about us.
translation.zh: 我猜那个大傻子真的很在乎我们

translation.en: Yeah, he really did.
translation.zh: 是的 他很在乎

translation.en: [George] King James, we meet at last.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯国王 我们终于见面了

translation.en: Yes, yes. Kudos, Washington.
translation.zh: 是的 干得不错 华盛顿

translation.en: I see that you managed to evade the trap your old friend Benedict laid for you.
translation.zh: 我看到你躲开了 老朋友本尼迪克特为你准备的陷阱

translation.en: Evade this, butter teeth!
translation.zh: 试试躲开这个呀 大呲牙

translation.en: Sam, you're not gonna…
translation.zh: 山姆 你打不中…

translation.en: -[laughing] -[Thomas] It's a hologram.
translation.zh: 那是全息影像

translation.en: Where's my wife, you bastard?
translation.zh: 我妻子在哪儿 混蛋？

translation.en: I believe you mean… Where is your future queen?
translation.zh: 我想你是问…未来的王后在哪儿？

translation.en: Never!
translation.zh: 绝不可能！

translation.en: Oh, you'll come round.
translation.zh: 你会改变主意的

translation.en: Martha!
translation.zh: 玛莎！

translation.en: If you lay even one of your sausage fingers on her,
translation.zh: 你的肥手指要是敢碰她一下

translation.en: I'll rip your fucking dick off!
translation.zh: 我就把你的鸡巴折断！

translation.en: You better make it quick, George,
translation.zh: 你最好快点 乔治

translation.en: because we're about to become very well acquainted.
translation.zh: 因为我们马上就要很熟了

translation.en: No more repartee, James.
translation.zh: 别再逞口舌之快了 詹姆斯

translation.en: No more games!
translation.zh: 别再玩把戏了！

translation.en: I want you face-to-face.
translation.zh: 我要面对面对峙

translation.en: Hmm. What did you have in mind?
translation.zh: 你想什么时候？

translation.en: Tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天

translation.en: For all the fucking marbles.
translation.zh: 赌上一切

translation.en: My squad. Your squad!
translation.zh: 我的队伍 你的队伍！

translation.en: You mean, your squad and my giant fuck-off army!
translation.zh: 你是说 你的队伍和我的庞大军团！

translation.en: Bring me every Redcoat alive for all I care.
translation.zh: 把每个活着的英军都叫上吧 我才不管

translation.en: I'll bring extra gas for my chainsaws.
translation.zh: 我会给我的链锯带够汽油

translation.en: I accept. Tomorrow morning. Attrition Field.
translation.zh: 我接受 明天早上 消耗战场

translation.en: Eight o'clock, sharp. Don't be late.
translation.zh: 8点整 别迟到

translation.en: [Paul yelling] Clyde!
translation.zh: 克莱德！

translation.en: Hmm. He gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 他会没事吗？

translation.en: You sacrificed Clyde… to save us?
translation.zh: 你牺牲了克莱德…来救我们？

translation.en: Clyde sacrificed himself.
translation.zh: 是克莱德牺牲了他自己

translation.en: I love my new people friends,
translation.zh: 我爱我的新人类朋友们

translation.en: but I loved Clyde, too!
translation.zh: 但我也爱克莱德！

translation.en: He was my brother!
translation.zh: 它是我的兄弟！

translation.en: There's gotta be something we can do.
translation.zh: 我们肯定有什么办法

translation.en: Well, I'm in a book club with Clara Barton.
translation.zh: 我和克拉拉巴顿是一个读书俱乐部的

translation.en: [scoffs] The groundbreaking medical practitioner?
translation.zh: 就是那位先驱医务工作者

translation.en: His name's Clara?
translation.zh: 他叫克拉拉？

translation.en: [Clara] I think I can save him.
translation.zh: （巴顿药店） 我觉得我可以救它

translation.en: But it will require the full breadth of my cybernetic research to do so.
translation.zh: 但这要用上我的 整套机械控制论研究成果

translation.en: -Meaning? -Meaning when I'm done…
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -意思是等我完成时…

translation.en: He'll be more machine than animal.
translation.zh: 它将更像一台机器 而不是动物

translation.en: And there's also a chance
translation.zh: 还有可能

translation.en: that at some point in the distant future, he'll rise up against us and--
translation.zh: 在遥远未来的某个时刻 它会起身反抗我们 并且…

translation.en: The horse owes me three bucks, so do what you gotta do, Doc.
translation.zh: 这匹马欠我三块钱 该做什么就做什么吧 医生

translation.en: It's a long shot. My nanotechnology is advanced,
translation.zh: 机会渺茫 我的纳米技术很先进

translation.en: but there's really just no substitute for living tissue.
translation.zh: 但活体组织没有什么替代品

translation.en: Go. I need to be alone with Clyde.
translation.zh: 走吧 我想单独和克莱德在一起

translation.en: Okay, Paul. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 保罗

translation.en: Say what you will about these colonists,
translation.zh: 无论你对这些殖民地居民有何意见… （殖民地桑德斯炸鸡）

translation.en: but frying a chicken and putting it in a bucket,
translation.zh: …但把鸡肉油炸 然后放在桶里

translation.en: that's a solid idea.
translation.zh: 这主意真不错

translation.en: Aren't you thirsty, my queen?
translation.zh: 你不渴吗 我的王后？

translation.en: I'll never drink your over-taxed tea, James.
translation.zh: 我永远不会喝 你这收税过度的茶 詹姆斯

translation.en: You'll feel much more agreeable after a relaxing soak.
translation.zh: 泡个轻松澡之后 你就会更配合了

translation.en: Arnold, has milady's bath been drawn?
translation.zh: 阿诺德 夫人的洗澡水准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yes, my liege. Earl Grey, hot.
translation.zh: 准备好了 陛下 热伯爵红茶

translation.en: Excellent!
translation.zh: 好极了！

translation.en: Oh! [laughing] Look at this, it's a double-stuffed pizza crust.
translation.zh: 看啊 是双层饼皮披萨

translation.en: Just… I mean, do the maths, Arnold. It's impossible.
translation.zh: 这…你想想 阿诺德 简直难以置信

translation.en: Did you want some?
translation.zh: 你要吗？

translation.en: Enjoy it while you can, James.
translation.zh: 趁还能吃就多吃点吧 詹姆斯

translation.en: Before my husband rips your fucking dick off!
translation.zh: 在我丈夫折断你的鸡巴之前！

translation.en: My dear, now that my Ultimate Doomsday Machine is complete,
translation.zh: 亲爱的 现在我的终极末日机器 已经完成了 （末日机器）

translation.en: your husband and his band of traitorous ne'er-do-wells
translation.zh: 你丈夫和他的饭桶反叛团伙

translation.en: will soon be ripping their own dicks off.
translation.zh: 很快就会折断自己的鸡巴

translation.en: -[scoffs] Why would they do that? -Do what?
translation.zh: -为什么他们要那么做？ -做什么？

translation.en: Rip their own dicks off?
translation.zh: 折断他们自己的鸡巴？

translation.en: Because! That's why! [laughs maniacally]
translation.zh: 因为！不用理由！

translation.en: Is he a cookie or is he a puss?
translation.zh: 这是曲奇还是猫咪？

translation.en: You know what? I don't care. He's my new best friend, that's who he is.
translation.zh: 算了 我不在乎 它现在是我最好的朋友

translation.en: Yes, my king, there is so much this bountiful new land has to offer.
translation.zh: 是 我的国王 这片富饶的新土地 蕴藏了很多好东西

translation.en: Yes. And which corner of my new kingdom
translation.zh: 是的 你要选我的新王国的哪个角落

translation.en: will you choose to rule, I wonder?
translation.zh: 做你的属地呢？

translation.en: Why don't you take a Dakota? Hell, take both.
translation.zh: 不如拿走一个达科他吧 算了 两个都拿去

translation.en: Why don't I take the whole thing? [laughs]
translation.zh: 我为什么不全拿走呢？

translation.en: But why?
translation.zh: 可是为什么？

translation.en: Because, you double-stuffed buffoon, why would I want to eat a slice…
translation.zh: 因为啊 你这个愚蠢的小丑 既然我能吃掉整个披萨…

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！

translation.en: …when I can eat the whole a-pizza pie?
translation.zh: …为什么只拿一片呢？

translation.en: Finally, freedom has a birthday. Tomorrow.
translation.zh: 自由终于有了生日 就是明天

translation.en: So, go home.
translation.zh: 回家吧

translation.en: Go home to your friends,
translation.zh: 回到朋友身边

translation.en: to your families, to your loved ones.
translation.zh: 陪伴家人和爱侣

translation.en: And then, ready your arsenals.
translation.zh: 然后准备好你的武器

translation.en: Bring not the weapons you would use to topple men,
translation.zh: 你要带的武器不是用来打败人

translation.en: but the weapons that you would use to topple armies.
translation.zh: 而是用来打败军队

translation.en: The weapons you would use to topple nations.
translation.zh: 用来打败国家

translation.en: For tomorrow, our revolution dies
translation.zh: 明天 我们的革命将死去

translation.en: and America is born.
translation.zh: 美利坚将会诞生

translation.en: Guide me, old friend.
translation.zh: 引导我吧 老朋友

translation.en: Show me the way.
translation.zh: 为我指明道路

translation.en: [Abe] George, I wish I had a million friends like you!
translation.zh: 乔治 真希望我有上百万个你这样的朋友！

translation.en: …a million friends…
translation.zh: …上百万个…

translation.en: Abe, you forward-thinking son of bitch!
translation.zh: 亚伯 你这个高瞻远瞩的混蛋！

translation.en: But we're still gonna need a lot of firepower.
translation.zh: 但我们还需要很多火力

translation.en: [man] Well, hey, welcome to Y'all Mart. How can I help you?
translation.zh: 嘿 欢迎来到你尔玛 有什么可以效劳的？

translation.en: Oh, hey, how's it goin'? I need guns.
translation.zh: 嘿 你好吗？我需要枪

translation.en: Well, bless your heart.
translation.zh: 为你祈祷

translation.en: And did you have any particular type in mind?
translation.zh: 你有什么想要的型号吗？

translation.en: Um, whatever the firearm equivalent of a massive overreaction would be.
translation.zh: 算得上超级反应过度的火力就行

translation.en: Like, for every bullet fired at me,
translation.zh: 每有一颗子弹射向我

translation.en: I'd want to be able to fire several hundred in return.
translation.zh: 我都希望能打回去数百发

translation.en: Oh, I see. And what do you plan on using them for?
translation.zh: 我明白了 你准备拿来做什么用？

translation.en: -Hunting? -Perfect!
translation.zh: -打猎？ -完美！

translation.en: I can definitely help you with that.
translation.zh: 我一定可以帮上忙

translation.en: Now, we do have a waiting period.
translation.zh: 我们确实有等待时长

translation.en: And it's over. Let's get you heavily armed, big fella.
translation.zh: 结束了 让我们给你装备起来吧 大个子

translation.en: Fantastic! Say, aren't you Mr. Kinko's boy?
translation.zh: 好极了！你是不是金考先生的小孩？

translation.en: Yes, sir. Frederick Xavier Kinko. Nice to meet ya.
translation.zh: 是的 先生 联邦快印金考 幸会

translation.en: Well, Fred X. Kinko, that's convenient.
translation.zh: 联邦快印金考 真方便

translation.en: I'm also looking for a photocopier.
translation.zh: 我还要买复印机

translation.en: The best in the colonies.
translation.zh: 殖民地最好的复印机

translation.en: Were you able to sleep?
translation.zh: 你们睡得好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Slept like a log.
translation.zh: -是的 -睡得很香

translation.en: Neither was I. No matter, we'll all sleep soon enough…
translation.zh: 我也没睡好 没关系 我们很快可以睡个够…

translation.en: in the beds of vanquished kings.
translation.zh: 就躺在战败的国王的床上

translation.en: Wow, that was beautiful phrasing. You're gettin' pretty good at this.
translation.zh: 哇 说得很好 你越来越熟练了

translation.en: You like that? Really? Check this out.
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗？真的？看看这个

translation.en: Teamwork, it makes the dream work.
translation.zh: 团队合作 梦想成真

translation.en: Whoa! He's right. It does.
translation.zh: 他说得对 没错

translation.en: Okay, that, right there, that's leadership.
translation.zh: 好了 这就是领导力

translation.en: Thanks, guys. Look, man, I gotta say, I'm feeling pretty confident.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们 我得说 我现在很自信

translation.en: Maybe things are going to work out after all.
translation.zh: 也许最后一切都会很顺利

translation.en: -Holy shit. -Fuck me.
translation.zh: -该死 -我去

translation.en: All right. I'm not gonna sugarcoat this.
translation.zh: 好吧 我就不掩饰了

translation.en: Three against ten thousand? That's pretty bad odds.
translation.zh: 三个人对抗一万人？胜算太小了

translation.en: -For us. -Well, we have the high ground.
translation.zh: -我们的胜算很小 -我们占据了有利地形

translation.en: You have more than the high ground.
translation.zh: 你们可不止有有利地形

translation.en: Geronimo! Blacksmith! We thought you deserted.
translation.zh: 杰罗尼莫！铁匠！ 我们以为你们放弃了

translation.en: Thought about it, like, really hard, then started going in the other direction.
translation.zh: 我非常仔细地想过了 然后开始朝另一个方向前进

translation.en: Even booked an Air T&P on the opposite side of town.
translation.zh: 甚至在城市另一边订了一顶帐篷民宿

translation.en: But despite my better judgment,
translation.zh: 但是 虽然明知不可取

translation.en: I ate the deposit and decided to come.
translation.zh: 我还是决定牺牲掉定金赶过来

translation.en: Because this is my land
translation.zh: 因为这是我的土地

translation.en: and I don't need anybody's permission to defend it.
translation.zh: 我不需要经过任何人的允许去捍卫它

translation.en: And Mr. Smith, you'll join the fight as well?
translation.zh: 匠先生 你也要参与战斗吗？

translation.en: I figured, if we're gonna end up with an old white dude in charge,
translation.zh: 我想过了 如果最后让一个白人老头掌权

translation.en: we could do a hell of a lot worse than you, George Washington.
translation.zh: 远不如让你乔治华盛顿来掌权

translation.en: You're one of the good-ish ones.
translation.zh: 你已经算好的了

translation.en: All that silver… for one bullet.
translation.zh: 那么多银子…造一颗子弹

translation.en: Yeah, so you better make it count.
translation.zh: 是的 你最好让它派上用场

translation.en: We will, and we'll do it in style.
translation.zh: 我们会的 而且还要干得帅气

translation.en: [Samuel] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I commissioned Betsy Ross and Tim Gunn to make these last night.
translation.zh: 我委托贝特西罗斯 和提姆冈恩连夜赶制

translation.en: Tim Gunn? Sounds like a badass.
translation.zh: 提姆冈恩？听起来像个坏人

translation.en: My dream, as silly as it seems now, was that after our victory today,
translation.zh: 也许现在看起来有点傻 我的梦想是在今天胜利后

translation.en: this design would become a national symbol.
translation.zh: 这个设计能成为国家的标识

translation.en: The first ever American flag.
translation.zh: 第一面美利坚旗帜

translation.en: -A symbol of our indomitable spirit. -Of our thirst for knowledge!
translation.zh: -象征着我们不屈的精神 -对知识的渴求！

translation.en: Of our tireless quest to kick ass!
translation.zh: 不知疲倦地争强好胜！

translation.en: And, and! I'm just spitballing here,
translation.zh: 我只是提个建议

translation.en: but maybe this style of blouse will become the uniform
translation.zh: 也许这件时髦的衬衫可以成为

translation.en: of the first ever American national pastime.
translation.zh: 美利坚首个全民娱乐活动的制服

translation.en: It'll be like cricket, but with actual rules.
translation.zh: 这项活动将类似于板球 但有真正的规则

translation.en: And you won't even have to be athletic to participate.
translation.zh: 不用体格健壮也可以参与

translation.en: -Or have two arms. -And women can play, too.
translation.zh: -也不必有两只手臂 -女人也可以参与

translation.en: You know, don't… Let's not get sidetracked.
translation.zh: 别…不要转移话题

translation.en: Hark, the national bird!
translation.zh: 听 是国鸟！

translation.en: [Geronimo] You took everything else.
translation.zh: -好！ -拿去吧 其他的你都拿走了

translation.en: You know what we need now? A national song.
translation.zh: 你们知道现在还缺什么吗？一首国曲

translation.en: I believe you mean…
translation.zh: 我想你说的是…

translation.en: a national anthem.
translation.zh: 一首国歌

translation.en: ♪ If I leave here tomorrow ♪
translation.zh: 如果我明天就离开

translation.en: ♪ Would you still remember me? ♪
translation.zh: 你还会记得我吗？

translation.en: ♪ For I must be traveling on now ♪
translation.zh: 现在我必须踏上旅程

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause there's too many places I've got to see ♪
translation.zh: 因为我还要去很多地方

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I'm as free as a bird now ♪
translation.zh: 因为我现在像飞鸟一样自由

translation.en: [crowd joins in] ♪ And this bird you cannot change ♪
translation.zh: 一只无法被你改变的飞鸟

translation.en: [all] ♪ Lord help me, I can't change ♪
translation.zh: 主啊 帮帮我 没人能改变我

translation.en: [Thomas] This is so beautiful, George!
translation.zh: 太棒了 乔治！

translation.en: [George] I know, it rocks, right? I wrote it last night.
translation.zh: 我知道 很赞吧？我昨晚写的

translation.en: I'm gonna request that song
translation.zh: 从今以后

translation.en: at every party from now until the end of time.
translation.zh: 我要在每个派对上放这首歌

translation.en: No. No, not the song.
translation.zh: 不 不是说歌

translation.en: The Americans!
translation.zh: 是美国人！

translation.en: [gasps] They came. It worked!
translation.zh: 他们来了 成功了！

translation.en: What worked, G-Dub?
translation.zh: 什么成功了 乔？

translation.en: I found an old note from Abe last night.
translation.zh: 我昨晚找到亚伯的一张旧字条

translation.en: And he said he wished he had a million friends like me.
translation.zh: 他说他希望有上百万个我这样的朋友

translation.en: And that's when I realized, I can have a million friends.
translation.zh: 然后我才意识到 我是可以有上百万个朋友

translation.en: Oh! Why settle for 20 bros when you could have a million,
translation.zh: 既然能有上百万个兄弟 为什么要拘泥于20个呢？

translation.en: no matter how different they look.
translation.zh: 无论他们看起来多不同 都没关系

translation.en: Exactly! Sam, that's the American way!
translation.zh: 没错！山姆 这就是美利坚精神！

translation.en: Hey, guys. Did ya hear?
translation.zh: 嘿 各位 听到了吗？

translation.en: I'm not racist anymore! I'm doin' it!
translation.zh: 我没有种族主义了！我可以的！

translation.en: Super.
translation.zh: 真好

translation.en: George, how did you do this?
translation.zh: 乔治 你怎么做到的？

translation.en: How did you reach this many people overnight?
translation.zh: 一夜之间 你是怎么联系了这么多人？

translation.en: I remembered something one of my friends told me about flyers.
translation.zh: 我想起一个朋友说过传单的事 （殖民地金考快印）

translation.en: They're a great way to communicate with a widespread audience.
translation.zh: 这是一种和大量受众沟通的良好方式 （加入革命！明天中午）

translation.en: I spent all night distributing these all over this great land,
translation.zh: 我花了一晚上 把这些传单发遍这片大地

translation.en: from sea to shining sea.
translation.zh: 从此岸到彼岸

translation.en: [Thomas] That's thousands of miles! How did you--
translation.zh: 那得有上千公里！你是怎么…

translation.en: Oh, I had a little help from the fastest racist in the colonies!
translation.zh: 我让殖民地最快的 马族主义者帮了点小忙！

translation.en: -[Samuel] What have they done to you? -[Geronimo] Does that hurt?
translation.zh: -他们对你做了什么？ -疼不疼？

translation.en: [in robotic voice] The British are coming… to get their asses kicked!
translation.zh: 英国人要…准备挨揍了！

translation.en: Heh. Well, I am just glad that we got the band back together.
translation.zh: 我很高兴 队伍又团聚了

translation.en: All right, everybody, come on! Grab an AR-15.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 来吧！ 拿上一把AR-15

translation.en: These little death machines here are gonna even the odds for us.
translation.zh: 这些小小的死亡机器 将为我们追平胜算

translation.en: But once the war is over though, okay, I definitely need them back.
translation.zh: 但一旦战争结束 我一定要回收它们

translation.en: Yeah, man. No problem.
translation.zh: 是 伙计 没问题

translation.en: Yeah, they're just way too dangerous for civilians to keep. Am I right?
translation.zh: 让市民拥有它们太危险了 是不是？

translation.en: That is completely reasonable.
translation.zh: 非常合理

translation.en: What in God's name are we waiting for?
translation.zh: 我们到底在等什么？

translation.en: Why are we not attacking?
translation.zh: 为什么不进攻？

translation.en: Beggin' your pardon, me lord,
translation.zh: 抱歉 陛下

translation.en: the Americans was just changing their kits into the stars and stripes, see?
translation.zh: 美利坚人正在换上 星条纹的装备 看到没？

translation.en: Then they sang a song for a bit, yeah.
translation.zh: 然后他们稍微唱了会儿歌

translation.en: Now it looks like they're settlin' some personal differences.
translation.zh: 他们现在好像在处理一些个人差异

translation.en: Shan't be long.
translation.zh: 不会太久

translation.en: We don't have to wait for them to get dressed.
translation.zh: 我们不需要等他们穿好衣服

translation.en: Attack, you idiots!
translation.zh: 进攻 傻瓜！

translation.en: Copy that, Command. Commencing bombardment.
translation.zh: 收到 指挥官 开始轰炸

translation.en: Now, let's go start a fucking revolution!
translation.zh: 现在让我们开始革命吧！

translation.en: Kick it!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: Tread on them! Tread the fuck all over them!
translation.zh: 践踏他们 把他们踩趴下！

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 不

translation.en: Me-ronimo!
translation.zh: 杰罗尼莫是我！

translation.en: Edison, give me that juice!
translation.zh: 爱迪生 给我点能量！

translation.en: For America! Charge!
translation.zh: 为了美利坚！冲啊！

translation.en: [Benedict] Artillery. Open fire on the front.
translation.zh: 炮兵 对前方开火

translation.en: [soldier over speaker] But, my lord, we'll hit our own men.
translation.zh: 可是陛下 我们会打到自己人

translation.en: Fuck's sake. I'm evil!
translation.zh: 去他的 我是恶人！

translation.en: We're the bad guys! Jesus, pay attention!
translation.zh: 我们是坏人！老天 注意了！

translation.en: Now, open fire or I'll eat your bones!
translation.zh: 赶紧开火 不然我嚼烂你们的骨头！

translation.en: [clears throat] Commander.
translation.zh: 指挥官

translation.en: [commander over speaker] Roger, roger. All cannon, open fire. Danger close.
translation.zh: 收到 所有加农炮 开火 敌人靠近了

translation.en: We've gotta do something about those cannons!
translation.zh: 我们得想办法对付那些加农炮！

translation.en: Wait a minute. Is that Martha?
translation.zh: 等等 那是玛莎吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God! Edison, on me!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！爱迪生 跟我来！

translation.en: [grunts] Paul, take out those walkers or we're sunk!
translation.zh: 保罗 杀了那些步兵 不然我们就完了！

translation.en: -Affirmative. Commencing attack run. -Edison, give me a lift.
translation.zh: -了解 开始进攻突袭 -爱迪生 捎我一程

translation.en: I'm on it! Science, don't fail me now.
translation.zh: 我在准备了！科学 现在可别掉链子

translation.en: -[George] Edison, fly straight! -[Edison] My thrusters took some damage!
translation.zh: -爱迪生 直线飞行！ -我的推进器受损了！

translation.en: Just get me to that elephant!
translation.zh: 带我去那头大象身上！

translation.en: -[Martha in British accent] Ello, guv'ner! -[laughing] Oh, Martha! Thank God!
translation.zh: -你好 长官！ -哦 玛莎！ 谢天谢地！我真高兴你…没事吧？

translation.en: I'm just so happy that you're… safe?
translation.zh: 谢天谢地！我真高兴你…没事吧？

translation.en: Stay on target.
translation.zh: 瞄准目标

translation.en: Stay on target.
translation.zh: 瞄准目标

translation.en: Well, Manchester, if you want something done right…
translation.zh: 曼彻斯特 如果你想做点好事…

translation.en: Get some! Get some! Get some! [grunts]
translation.zh: 来啊！

translation.en: -What the… What are you? -[snaps]
translation.zh: 什么…你是什么玩意儿？

translation.en: Oi! Handball! That's a foul, ya wanker!
translation.zh: 手球！犯规 傻子！

translation.en: Maybe that's true in Britain.
translation.zh: 也许在英国是这样

translation.en: But this is America, asshole! [grunts]
translation.zh: 但这里是美利坚 混蛋！

translation.en: Touchdown!
translation.zh: 达阵！

translation.en: [Benedict] What is the deal with these chaps?
translation.zh: 这些家伙怎么回事？

translation.en: It's like they have no quit in them.
translation.zh: 他们好像根本不知撤退

translation.en: No matter, I guess I'll just skip to the end, then.
translation.zh: 算了 我看我直接跳到结局吧

translation.en: Game over, old friend.
translation.zh: 游戏结束 老朋友

translation.en: We're surrounded. Why aren't they advancing?
translation.zh: 我们被包围了 他们为什么不前进？

translation.en: Because that's not part of the plan, ya dumb twat!
translation.zh: 因为那不是计划的一部分 你这个傻子！

translation.en: Oh, fuck!
translation.zh: 哦 该死！

translation.en: Holy! What is that thing?
translation.zh: 天啊！那是什么东西？

translation.en: It's a weather control device. Look at the tea bags.
translation.zh: 那是个天气控制设备 瞧那些茶包

translation.en: It's designed to seed the clouds… with tea!
translation.zh: 它们是用来在云朵里…种上茶！

translation.en: Teabagging them? Literally? But why?
translation.zh: 把它们做成茶包？ 字面意义的茶包？可是为什么？

translation.en: To make them rain tea.
translation.zh: 让它们能降下茶水

translation.en: Every man, woman and child beneath these spacious skies
translation.zh: 到时这片辽阔天空下的男女老少

translation.en: will be turned British instantly.
translation.zh: 都会马上变成英国人

translation.en: The revolution will not only be over,
translation.zh: 革命不仅会结束

translation.en: it will effectively have never even occurred.
translation.zh: 而且会变成从未发生过的模样

translation.en: Aw, fuck! These are those global stakes you were talking about, aren't they?
translation.zh: 该死！这就是你说的全球都有份

translation.en: Yep. If he successfully British-izes every colonist in the New World,
translation.zh: 是的 如果他能成功把新世界的 每个殖民地居民都变成英国人

translation.en: he won't stop there. He'll British-ize the entire world.
translation.zh: 他就不会罢休 他会把全世界都变成英国人

translation.en: [chuckling] Okay. You know what? Fuck it.
translation.zh: 好吧 随便了

translation.en: -It was fun while it lasted, boys. -Keep it.
translation.zh: -及时行乐 伙计们 -你留着吧

translation.en: This is your last moment as a colonist. You may as well enjoy it.
translation.zh: 这是你作为殖民地居民的最后一刻 你也该享受一下

translation.en: Besides, it's sorta perfect.
translation.zh: 另外这样也挺好的

translation.en: I mean, beer's the exact opposite of tea.
translation.zh: 啤酒正好是茶的反义词

translation.en: So, one last "fuck you" to the Brits. Am I right?
translation.zh: 对英国人最后说一声“去你妈的” 好不好？

translation.en: The exact opposite. That's it! Sam, hold this keg steady.
translation.zh: 正相反 就是这样！ 山姆 扛好这个木桶

translation.en: -But it's full of beer! -It better be.
translation.zh: -可是里面全是啤酒！ -那正好

translation.en: -Blacksmith, hammer this valve into place. -On it!
translation.zh: -铁匠 把这个阀门敲进去 -好的！

translation.en: Geronimo, keep track of where that thing is headed.
translation.zh: 杰罗尼莫 留意那个东西要往哪里去

translation.en: That won't be too hard.
translation.zh: 这不难

translation.en: And, Paul, I'm gonna need a lot of juice!
translation.zh: 还有保罗 我需要很多能量！

translation.en: -Yo, Edison! What is that shit? -It is science.
translation.zh: -哟 爱迪生！这是什么东西？ -是科学

translation.en: The science that's going to win this war.
translation.zh: 能帮我们赢得战争的科学

translation.en: Last time you tried "science,"
translation.zh: 上次你用“科学”

translation.en: you set off a bomb that almost killed us.
translation.zh: 你引爆的炸弹差点炸死我们

translation.en: How can you be so sure that this will work?
translation.zh: 你怎么能肯定这样做有效？

translation.en: Well, I'm not sure, Sammy, but I have a hypothesis.
translation.zh: 我不能肯定 小山姆 但我有一个假设

translation.en: So, let's go test that hypothesis and draw some fucking conclusions!
translation.zh: 让我们来验证一下这个假设 得出一些结论！

translation.en: This is for science!
translation.zh: 这是为了科学！

translation.en: No! No! Not like this! Not like this, Martha!
translation.zh: 不！不要这样！玛莎！

translation.en: -Drink it, George! Drink it in. -No! I won't do it! Ah!
translation.zh: -喝吧 乔治！喝掉它 -不！我不要！

translation.en: Fine, resist. And I'll gain full custody of our son the moment he is born.
translation.zh: 好吧 继续抵抗 我们儿子一出生 我就会得到他的全部监护权

translation.en: And you'll be helpless to stop it.
translation.zh: 而你毫无办法

translation.en: You'll have failed as a leader, as a husband and as a father,
translation.zh: 到时你会是一个 失败的领袖、丈夫和父亲

translation.en: just like your father before you.
translation.zh: 就像你父亲对你而言那样

translation.en: Hey, hey, it's okay.
translation.zh: 嘿 没事

translation.en: Even though you totally blew it
translation.zh: 虽然你彻底搞砸了

translation.en: and let everyone on the team down, you tried your best, witch.
translation.zh: 让团队中所有人失望 但你尽力了 女巫

translation.en: I'm not a witch, Sam. I am a scientist.
translation.zh: 我不是女巫 山姆 我是个科学家

translation.en: And no, I did not.
translation.zh: 而且我没有失败

translation.en: The beam. It wasn't meant to blow the Teabagger out of the sky.
translation.zh: 那道光不是为了让茶包在空中炸开

translation.en: -Nope. -Horse sound.
translation.zh: -对 -马叫声

translation.en: What did you do, human lady friend?
translation.zh: 你做了什么 女性人类朋友？

translation.en: I reversed the polarity of the tea.
translation.zh: 我改变了茶的极性

translation.en: So, if it ain't tea no more, what the fuck is it?
translation.zh: 如果这不再是茶水 那它是什么？

translation.en: The exact opposite of tea.
translation.zh: 是茶的反义词

translation.en: [gasps] It's beer! Beer won the war!
translation.zh: 是啤酒！啤酒赢得了战争！

translation.en: What? No, beer didn't win… No, science!
translation.zh: 什么？不 不是啤酒赢得… 不 是科学！

translation.en: [all] Bro!
translation.zh: 哥们！

translation.en: I'd just like to say something, you know, as the leader of the group.
translation.zh: 作为团队的领袖 我想说几句话

translation.en: Thirty minutes ago, I dreamed of a bigger fraternity.
translation.zh: 30分钟前 我梦想拥有 更庞大的兄弟会

translation.en: And now, I look around and I have it.
translation.zh: 现在我环顾四周 发现我已经拥有了

translation.en: That's the power of positive thinking, guys.
translation.zh: 这就是乐观思维的力量 各位

translation.en: -Believe in yourselves! -Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: -相信自己！ -你在逗我吗？

translation.en: Mmm, delicious, isn't it?
translation.zh: 很美味吧？

translation.en: Oh! George? What happened?
translation.zh: 乔治？怎么回事？

translation.en: Science, Martha. Science happened.
translation.zh: 科学 玛莎 科学出场了

translation.en: Oh, my God! I could have… I almost…
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！我刚才可能…差点…

translation.en: [shushes] No, don't you worry about that.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！我刚才可能…差点… 不 你别担心

translation.en: You're back now and we've just got one thing left to do.
translation.zh: 你现在已经回来了 我们还有一件事要做

translation.en: -Have awesome sex! -Final boss battle. What?
translation.zh: -好好做爱！ -最终反派之战 什么？

translation.en: Uh, yep. Yep. Final boss battle.
translation.zh: 对 最终反派之战

translation.en: -Bro! -No!
translation.zh: -兄弟！ -不！

translation.en: Bros. Bros everywhere!
translation.zh: 兄弟 到处都是兄弟！

translation.en: It reeks of Ye Olde Axe body spray!
translation.zh: 到处都是艾科止汗剂的味道！

translation.en: [George] Excuse me, sir.
translation.zh: 抱歉 先生

translation.en: Do you have a moment to talk about freedom?
translation.zh: 你有时间聊一下自由吗？

translation.en: Aren't you surprised to see me leading the British and not King James?
translation.zh: 看到是我 而不是詹姆斯国王 在指挥英国人 你不觉得奇怪吗？

translation.en: What? No. You obviously pulled a Benedict Arnold.
translation.zh: 什么？不会 你显然是 本尼迪克特阿诺德了一把

translation.en: A what?
translation.zh: 什么一把？

translation.en: A Benedict Arnold. You're a thing now, bro.
translation.zh: 本尼迪克特阿诺德 这是个固定表达了 老兄

translation.en: Whenever you get fucked over by a trusted friend,
translation.zh: 只要你被信任的朋友背叛

translation.en: it's called getting Benedict Arnolded. Right, everybody?
translation.zh: 就可以说被本尼迪克特阿诺德了 对吧 各位？

translation.en: -[all] Yeah. -It's totally a thing.
translation.zh: -是的 -完全正确

translation.en: No. You… You can't just do that.
translation.zh: 不 你不可以这样

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we can. Because we all voted on it.
translation.zh: 我们可以 因为我们都投票了

translation.en: And that's called…
translation.zh: 这就叫…

translation.en: [all] Fucking Democracy!
translation.zh: 他妈的民主！

translation.en: We're doin' it! [laughing] Oh, Georgie.
translation.zh: -我们讲民主！ -哦 小乔治

translation.en: You think you've won.
translation.zh: 你以为你赢了

translation.en: Mega Wolf!
translation.zh: 狼巨人！

translation.en: Geronimo, now!
translation.zh: 杰罗尼莫 上！

translation.en: Launch winch-chain.
translation.zh: 发射铰链

translation.en: Sammy, take the shot!
translation.zh: 小山姆 开枪！

translation.en: Here comes the boom, bitch.
translation.zh: 来了 贱人

translation.en: Guys, I don't know how much more he can take!
translation.zh: 各位 我不知道他还能坚持多久！

translation.en: -Where's the stupid bullet? -We're looking!
translation.zh: -那颗破子弹呢？ -我们在找！

translation.en: Any last regrets, old chum?
translation.zh: 还有什么悔恨的遗言吗 老朋友？

translation.en: Yeah, I only regret that I have but one life to give for my country.
translation.zh: 是的 我唯一后悔的是 我只能为我的国家献身一次

translation.en: Yes. Well, I suppose the one will have to do.
translation.zh: 是的 你现在不献身也不行了

translation.en: Oh, shit! It's right here. Guys! I found it!
translation.zh: 哦 该死！在这里 各位！我找到了！

translation.en: What are you smiling about, you idiot? You can't possibly kill me.
translation.zh: 傻子 你笑什么？你杀不了我

translation.en: I'm not trying to kill you, Ben.
translation.zh: 不是我想杀你 本

translation.en: They are. With America's favorite pastime.
translation.zh: 是他们 要用美国人 最喜欢的娱乐方式杀掉你

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Tax this, motherfucker!
translation.zh: 这个也收税试试 混蛋！

translation.en: [commentator] It's going way back to right field.
translation.zh: 远远飞向了右侧场地

translation.en: The bullet is still going! High up in there!
translation.zh: 子弹还在飞！又高又远！

translation.en: -Bugger! -He did it!
translation.zh: -妈呀！ -他做到了！

translation.en: John Henry Smith did it!
translation.zh: 约翰亨利黑铁匠做到了！

translation.en: Welcome to America!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到美利坚！

translation.en: [George] I wanna make a monument for Abe, too.
translation.zh: 我想为亚伯也建一座纪念碑

translation.en: But of course, Mr. President. Same as yours?
translation.zh: 当然可以 总统先生 和您那座一样吗？

translation.en: No, I.M. Pei.
translation.zh: 不 贝聿铭

translation.en: His should be a statue of him sitting there, staring at my monument.
translation.zh: 要给他建一座坐像 目视我的纪念碑

translation.en: [Abe chuckling] Who are you, Demi Moore?
translation.zh: 你谁啊 黛米摩尔吗？

translation.en: Why you gotta screw a ghost like that, George?
translation.zh: 为什么要这样折磨一个鬼魂 乔治？

translation.en: Abe! Ah, bro! God, it's good to see you again, man.
translation.zh: 亚伯！兄弟！天啊 再次见到你真好

translation.en: Well, you're gonna feel like a real turd after you see what I brought you. Hah!
translation.zh: 看到我给你带的东西后 你会更内疚的

translation.en: The Declaration! You saved it!
translation.zh: 《独立宣言》！你保存下来了！

translation.en: I did.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: A little of Mr. Scotch's invisible tape and it's as good as new.
translation.zh: 用了点思高牌透明胶带 完好如初

translation.en: It's beautiful, Abe.
translation.zh: 真好 亚伯

translation.en: It is, but you're the real national treasure here, George.
translation.zh: 是的 但你才是 真正的国家宝藏 乔治

translation.en: I'm proud of you, bud.
translation.zh: 我为你骄傲 伙计

translation.en: And no, there's no treasure map drawn on the back of it.
translation.zh: 不 背面没有画寻宝地图

translation.en: -Oh, man. -George, what are you doin', bro?
translation.zh: -哎呀 -乔治 你在干什么 老兄？

translation.en: -They're lookin' for you out there. -Oh, Sam!
translation.zh: -他们在到处找你 -山姆

translation.en: I'm glad you're here. I have something for you.
translation.zh: 你来得正好 我有东西给你

translation.en: -What is it? -A gift for my son's godfather.
translation.zh: -什么？ -给我儿子的教父准备的礼物

translation.en: -Who, me? -Yep.
translation.zh: -谁 我？ -是的

translation.en: I need someone I can trust with my son's life.
translation.zh: 我需要一个 能让我放心托付儿子性命的人

translation.en: And I always thought it would be Abe.
translation.zh: 我以前一直觉得这个人是亚伯

translation.en: But with him as a gho… a goner, I need to find someone else.
translation.zh: 但既然他已是鬼…逝者 我只能另寻他人

translation.en: George, I'm honored!
translation.zh: 乔治 我倍感荣幸！

translation.en: Hey, is that my hat? Oh, it is.
translation.zh: 嘿 那是我的帽子吗？是的

translation.en: But… Ugh. I don't know how to be a caretaker. I don't have those instincts.
translation.zh: 不过…我不知道怎么照顾人 我没有这种天赋

translation.en: No, don't think of it as being the caretaker.
translation.zh: 不 别把它当作一种看护的责任

translation.en: Think of it as being family.
translation.zh: 就当是成为一家人

translation.en: Like the fun, drunk,
translation.zh: 做一个有趣、爱喝酒

translation.en: now definitely no-longer-racist uncle that America has always needed.
translation.zh: 显然不再有种族主义的大叔 这正是美国一直需要的

translation.en: Uncle Sam. I like It.
translation.zh: 山姆大叔 我喜欢

translation.en: Uncle fucking Sam!
translation.zh: 混蛋山姆大叔！

translation.en: Come on, Uncle Sam, our countrymen await.
translation.zh: 走吧 山姆大叔 我们的国民都等着呢

translation.en: Hey, Denzel.
translation.zh: 嘿 丹泽尔

translation.en: My fellow Americans, on this day, July 4th, 1776,
translation.zh: 各位美利坚同胞 今天 1776年7月4日

translation.en: we are all finally free!
translation.zh: 我们终于都自由了！

translation.en: [man 1] What about your slaves?
translation.zh: 那你的奴隶们呢？

translation.en: -I said, what about your slaves? -[George] Well, see--
translation.zh: -我说 你的奴隶们呢？ -这个么…

translation.en: And what about women?
translation.zh: 还有女人呢？

translation.en: Will we be granted equality in your America?
translation.zh: 我们在你们美利坚能获得平等吗？

translation.en: -Yes, but-- -Sure, right after the Indians.
translation.zh: -是的 不过… -当然 排在印第安人后面

translation.en: Wait a second. I was under the impression we were getting our land back.
translation.zh: 等一下 我以为我们能把土地拿回来

translation.en: Good point. Um…
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: Oh, hey, can I keep this here machine gun?
translation.zh: 嘿 我能留下这把机关枪吗？

translation.en: Like, if a Mexican tries to take my property or something?
translation.zh: 以防某个墨西哥人 抢夺我的财产什么的？

translation.en: What? You just took this land from the Indians--
translation.zh: 什么？你刚从印第安人手上 抢走这片土地…

translation.en: He was coming for you. I saw it!
translation.zh: 他刚才想袭击你 我看到了！

translation.en: -He just shot him! In the back! -He was making a move, man. I swear it!
translation.zh: -他刚刚对他开枪了！从背后！ -他之前想动手 我发誓！

translation.en: We're gonna have a fair and unbiased judicial process, right?
translation.zh: 我们会有公平 无偏见的司法程序 对吗？

translation.en: -Everyone, just calm down! -Fuck you!
translation.zh: -各位 冷静！ -去你妈的！

translation.en: No, fuck you!
translation.zh: 不 去你妈的！

translation.en: Hey, I just wanna marry my boyfriend. Sinner!
translation.zh: -嘿 我只是想和我男朋友结婚 -罪人！

translation.en: There's gonna be comprehensive health care, right?
translation.zh: 会有健全的医保 对吗？

translation.en: [man 1] Seriously, dude. What about your slaves?
translation.zh: 说真的 老兄 你的奴隶们呢？

translation.en: Oh, God. We're gonna fuck this up, aren't we?
translation.zh: 哦 天啊 我们要搞砸了 是不是？

translation.en: Dagnabbit! I think we missed it, E's.
translation.zh: （华盛登-亚登斯-爱登生） 可恶！“登”字兄弟们 我觉得我们错过了
